Company Overview:

We are 37 Projects, a fast-growing YouTube Video Marketing Agency that helps health and wellness brands maximize their reach through high-quality video content, Shorts, and podcast marketing. We’re looking for a YouTube & Podcast Content Manager who can analyze long-form podcasts, craft compelling YouTube Shorts & Clips, and ensure all content aligns with the client’s brand voice and audience engagement strategies.



I. Content Manager Responsibilities



1. Content Consumption



- Watch 1–2 hour video podcasts on health, fitness, and nutrition topics.

- Develop a deep understanding of each podcast’s themes and key messages to inform content creation.



2. Clip & Short Identification (NOT Editing)



- Identify segments ideal for YouTube Clips and YouTube Shorts.

- Select the best 
nts for intros that build a compelling storytelling narrative.



3. Content Strategy & Quality Assurance



- Ensure all clips, shorts, and intros align with the client’s brand voice and content strategy.

- Perform content-only quality checks on first rough-cut videos (focus on flow, clarity, and messaging—not captions, graphics, or motion design).



4. Intros & Trailers



- Select punchy and engaging 
nts from the podcast to be used in the trailer (approx. 70–80 seconds).

- Provide editors with timestamps and key sentences to include, ensuring the trailer highlights the right topics or subtopics.

- Collaborate with the Project Manager and Video Editor to align on creative direction and client expectations.



Example: Similar to Steven Bartlett’s Diary of a CEO trailers, which combine intro narration with short, high-impact clips.



II. Scope of Work



- Manage content across five clients.

- Watch and process around 15–16 podcasts per month (on average, 3–4 per client).

- Produce selections for around 8 trailers per month (?2 per week, one per client).

- Deliverables include weekly clips, shorts, and trailers, ensuring consistency across all client channels.

- Collaborate closely with Project Managers and Video Editors to maintain smooth production flow and client satisfaction.



III Requirements:



1. Availability & Commitment:

- Full-time remote position - no other job commitments to ensure focus.

- Must have a high-performance laptop/computer and stable internet.



2. Experience & Education:

- Proven experience in video editing or podcast production (video/audio).

- Graduates in Communication, Multimedia, or Video Production are highly preferred.

- Experience in YouTube content creation (Shorts, Clips, long-form podcasts) - a bonus



3. Skills & Tools:

- SEO writing experience is a plus.

- Strong organizational and time management skills to handle multiple projects.

- Proficiency in:

   + Slack

   + Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive)

   + Notion

   + AI writing tools (ChatGPT, Claude)

   + YouTube SEO tools (VidIQ, SEMrush) – a bonus



4. Strong storytelling ability to identify and structure the most compelling 
nts in videos.



5. Preferred Bonus Skills:

- Knowledge of health, fitness, and nutrition topics (to select key 
nts effectively).

- Creative mindset with the ability to suggest innovative content formats & strategies.



???? How to Apply

???? Fill out this form to apply:

title: Order Entry and Sales Operations Associate
description:
Job Summary:

We are looking for a detail-oriented Sales Operations VA to manage incoming orders, maintain accurate records, and support the seamless coordination between customers, warehouses, and shippers. The ideal candidate will ensure smooth order flow, ensuring clear communication and up-to-date data at all stages.



Key Responsibilities:

 and input them into the system accurately.

- Fulfillment Coordination: Verify stock availability, create fulfillment requests, and track orders from initiation to delivery.

- Shipping Coordination: Collaborate with warehouses and shipping partners to ensure timely pickups and dispatch.

- Shipment Monitoring: Track Proof of Delivery (PODs), handle basic shipment claims, and escalate issues as necessary.

- Record Maintenance: Organize and maintain records, reports, and dashboards for operational visibility.



Mandatory Skills:

- Strong attention to detail and commitment to process discipline.

- Excellent written and spoken communication in English.

- Comfortable working with spreadsheets and CRM tools for order management.

- Ability to prioritize tasks, follow SOPs, and meet daily turnaround targets.

- Familiarity with order processing, fulfillment cycles, and shipping procedures.

- Strong time management skills and ability to work effectively under pressure.



Preferred Skills:

- Experience in sales operations, order entry, or customer service.

- Knowledge of shipment tracking, POD workflows, and handling basic claims.

- Exposure to the US market and familiarity with
 ticketing systems.

- Proficiency in CRM tools such as Salesforce or HubSpot.

- Familiarity with e-commerce platforms like Shopify or Amazon Seller Central.



Why Join Us:

- Well-defined processes with a supportive management team to guide your growth.

- Opportunities for professional development and meaningful contributions.

- Your efforts will directly impact the efficiency and success of our operations.

title: Virtual Assistant - Market Research & Operations
description:
We are seeking a full-time Virtual Assistant to support market research, product listings & operations for our US e-commerce business. We are open to professionals with different backgrounds as long as you have strong English skills, possess a natural flair for aesthetics and an analytical mindset. You will join a close-knit Filipino remote team. We value respect, support, and long-term collaboration - many teammates have been with us for 4-6 years.



* Hours: Monday–Friday, PH time (no night shift)

* Salary: PHP 25,000 – 45,000/month (based on related experience)

* Bonus: 13th-month bonus + performance incentives

* Off Days: Major holidays off, and 10 paid leave days



IMPORTANT: Please submit your application to 
 sent via OnlineJobs.ph messaging will not be processed.



## What You’ll Be Doing

- Research product ideas, trends, and customer demand for the US market

s

- Age 28 years or older (maturity and work stability preferred)

- Reliable and willing to put in extra effort during busy seasons when needed

a) IQ Test Score eg. 110

b) DISC Test Scores e.g. D18, I22, S12, C22

c) English Test Score - C2 required



Application Questions

Please answer in your own words and without AI assistance. This allows us to assess your actual English foundation, which is essential for this role.

1. Briefly describe your personality and hobbies

2. Summarize your work experience and skills

3. Describe any research, SEO, or ecommerce experience you have. Then explain why you believe you are a good fit for this role.

5. Rate your Canva and Photoshop skills from 1-10 separately (a plus but not mandatory for the job)

7. Current/most recent salary and b) realistic monthly salary expectation (PHP). We offer a 13th-month bonus. Overly high figures will not be considered.

8. Are you available for occasional weekend morning work?

9. Current employment status and earliest start date



Please give detailed information above to showcase your ability to communicate. End your application with the phrase - I am a rockstar. We look forward to you joining our team soon!

mbers with other channel management tasks

 Meetings alongside the rest of the team (all also Filipino)

title: Operations Coordinator (Finance Industry)
description:
Role Summary



We’re hiring an Operations Specialist who owns process, systems, and operational flow across finance, product, and client communication, with experience in the finance industry.



This role sits at the center of:



* finance workflows

* AI/product outputs

* client-facing operations



You’ll work hands-on with Notion, Slack, and Google Workspace to reduce manual friction, improve response times, and ensure nothing falls through the cracks.



This is not a passive admin role.

It’s a builder role for someone who thinks in workflows, structure, and execution.



Core Responsibilities



1. Systems & Workflow Ownership (Primary Focus)



* Design, build, and maintain clear operational workflows

* Connect processes across:



  * Notion (databases, task tracking, SOPs)

  * Slack (alerts, handovers, internal updates)

  * Google Workspace (Forms, Docs, Sheets, Drive)

* Own workflows for:



  * client intake and data collection

  * task creation and assignments

  * status updates and internal visibility

  * handovers between ops, finance, and product

* Monitor workflows to ensure reliability and clarity



Success = fewer manual errors and smoother execution every month.



2. Client Operations & Communication



* Act as the ops point-of-contact for client questions and requests

* Confidently acknowledge client queries even when validation is needed

* Use systems and tracking to ensure follow-ups happen on time

* Translate finance outputs into clear, client-friendly updates



3. Finance Workflow Coordination



* Ensure finance teams receive complete, clean inputs

* Reduce back-and-forth through structured forms and clear processes

* Track deadlines and dependencies across teams

* Flag bottlenecks before they become client issues



4. Process Documentation & Improvement



* Maintain SOPs in Notion

* Ensure documentation reflects live workflows, not outdated processes

* Continuously improve systems as the product evolves



Tools You’ll Work With Daily



* Notion (databases, SOPs, workflow tracking)

* Slack (internal coordination)

* Google Workspace (Forms, Sheets, Docs, Drive)

* CRM / finance tools (training provided)



Requirements



* 2–4 years experience in operations, systems, or workflow-heavy roles

* Strong understanding of process design and operational logic

* Confident written communicator

* Highly organised and proactive

* Comfortable working with finance and product teams (without needing to be the expert)



Nice to Have



* Experience supporting SaaS or finance operations

* Prior use of Notion as an operational system (not just notes)

* Startup or scale-up experience

* Remote-first team experience



What Success Looks Like



* Fewer operational errors

* Faster client response times

* Clear, predictable workflows

* Finance teams protected from chaos

* Clients who feel informed and supported

title: Conversion Rate Optimization Specialist, Landing Pages
description:
About LUCYD:

At LUCYD, we’re transforming the world of digital advertising with a focus on wellness, sustainability, and social responsibility. We specialize in compliant advertising for CBD, cannabis, and DTC wellness brands, and we're not just selling products—we're creating positive impact through Conscious Compounds™.



We’re looking for a Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Specialist, with a specific focus on landing pages, to join our marketing team. Your main role will be to design, optimize, and analyze landing pages that drive paid social ad performance and increase eCommerce conversions. Add the word "expedition" on your subject line to let us know you read the whole post.



Responsibilities:

Lead Landing Page Strategy: Own the landing page process—from wireframing to writing compelling copy and gathering visual assets

Collaborate with Designers & Developers: Ensure every page is visually stunning and built for high conversion

A/B Testing & Performance Analysis: Analyze data to continuously test and refine landing pages

Funnel Optimization: Audit the full eCommerce funnel and recommend improvements to boost performance



You MUST have the following qualifications:

3+ years of experience in CRO with focus on landing pages & eCommerce funnels

Proficient in Shopify, wireframing tools, and platforms like Unbounce, Leadpages, or similar

Strong analytical skills using Google Analytics, Hotjar, or similar tools

Excellent English communication skills (C1 Advanced level or Native)

Highly collaborative and detail-oriented

Must be available to work Eastern Time (EST/EDT) hours



If you believe you’re the right fit for this role, we’d love to hear from you. Send your portfolio, resume, and a short note about why you’re a great fit. Only applicants who follow all instructions and meet the qualifications will be considered.

We look forward to working with you!

title: GRAPHIC DESIGNER – ECOMMERCE (PART-TIME)
description:
ROLE OVERVIEW:

We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented part-time Graphic Designer (15–20 hours per week) to join our dynamic e-commerce team and help grow our presence across key channels such as Amazon, Walmart and Shopify. As a key player in our marketing and sales efforts, you will be responsible for creating visually compelling graphics that align with our brand identity and drive customer engagement and sales conversions across our product listings. This role requires a blend of creativity, e-commerce understanding, and the ability to produce high-quality designs under tight deadlines.



This role is 100% remote work.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Design and produce a wide range of digital assets, including product images, A+ content, banners, infographics, logos, and promotional materials that comply with Marketplace guidelines and standards.

- Drive sales and ensure a positive shopping experience across various devices by consistently providing high-quality, mobile-optimized designs for Amazon Marketplace pages.

- Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and execute creative concepts for campaigns, focusing on maximizing visibility and conversion rates on Amazon and other channels.

- Reference our brand book and branding guardrails to ensure brand consistency across all visual designs and digital assets.

- Use customer insights and performance data to iterate and improve visual content, aiming to increase engagement and conversion rates.

- Stay up-to-date with platform updates, trends in design, AI-assisted creative workflows, and e-commerce best practices to ensure our brand remains competitive and appealing to our target audience.

- Manage and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously, from concept to completion, ensuring timely delivery and quality standards.

- Provide creative input and suggestions to enhance visual communication of products, making them more compelling to potential buyers.

- Creation and iteration of SOPs to ensure our team can continue to scale whilst maintaining a high level of operation and execution.



KEY RESULTS:

- Improve conversion rates across product listings by optimizing content, visuals, and messaging to drive stronger customer engagement and purchase confidence.

- Optimize listing click through rate by testing new main images and creative assets for advertising campaigns.

- Less than 3x monthly occurrences of customer complaints related to misleading imagery by ensuring the production of clear and accurate visual content.

- Execute high-quality creative assets based on provided plans, including listing image optimization, Brand Store design, Premium A+ Content creation, and campaign videos, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and on-time delivery.



WHO YOU ARE:

- Minimum of 3 years of experience in digital sales-focused graphic design

- Proven graphic design experience with a strong portfolio showcasing digital design skills, particularly in an e-commerce context.

- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) or similar software, in addition to Canva, AI creative tools (such as Nano Banana, generative image tools, AI-assisted mockups, and background generation tools), and Microsoft Office Suite.

- Familiarity with various Marketplace Content guidelines and requirements including Amazon and Walmart

- Understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and web design best practices.

- Ability to interpret and adhere to brand guidelines and marketing strategies to produce effective designs.

- Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work well in a team environment and proactively ask questions and address issues.

- Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage deadlines in a fast-paced, changing environment.

- Experience with photo editing and optimizing digital images for web.

- Clear and concise written and oral communication skills.



WHY JOIN US:

A fast acting, vibrant and supportive team environment where creativity and innovation are encouraged.

The opportunity to work on a variety of projects, with the autonomy to bring your creative ideas to life.

Professional development opportunities to keep up with the latest trends and technologies in graphic design and e-commerce.



Application Process:

Please submit your resume along with a note saying “I am the graphic designer KASTLITE needs!” and a link to your online portfolio demonstrating relevant work experience. We're looking forward to reviewing your application!

title: Product Lister
description:
About the Role

We're looking for a detail-oriented Product Lister to join our e-commerce team. You'll transform product research into optimized Shopify listings that perform well on Google Shopping. This is a remote position perfect for someone who loves working with structure, pays attention to details, and wants to learn e-commerce operations.

What You'll Do

Your main responsibility: Create high-quality product listings in Shopify based on our research.

Daily tasks:



Import products into Shopify

Conduct keyword research for SEO optimization

Write compelling product titles and descriptions using AI tools

Create professional product images using AI image generators



Expected output: 20-25 products per day.

Requirements

Must have:



Excellent attention to detail (mistakes cost money!)

Strong written English skills

Basic understanding of e-commerce/online shopping

Comfortable learning new software (Shopify, AI tools, keyword research tools)

Reliable internet connection and computer

Able to follow detailed processes and checklists

Proactive communication when issues arise



Nice to have:



Experience with Shopify or other e-commerce platforms

Basic SEO knowledge

Experience with AI tools (ChatGPT, image generators)



Personal traits:



Self-motivated and disciplined (remote work)

Patient and thorough (quality over speed)

Eager to learn and improve

Able to handle repetitive tasks while maintaining quality



What We Offer



Hourly rate: $3-5/hour (based on experience and performance)

Flexible hours: Choose your own schedule

Fully remote: Work from anywhere

Complete training: Step-by-step handbook and video tutorials provided

Growth opportunity: Top performers can advance to team lead or store manager roles

Tools provided: Access to all necessary software and tools

Supportive team: Direct communication with store manager for questions

Performance bonuses: Potential bonuses for exceptional quality and speed

title: Social Media Manager For A Startup SaaS Company
description:
About Us:

Flow is a startup SaaS company looking for a dynamic and creative Social Media Manager to join our team and drive our social media strategy to new heights.



Position Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled Social Media Manager with proven experience in the SaaS industry. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in creating and managing engaging content, particularly in video formats for Instagram Reels and TikTok. Additionally, they must possess expertise in graphic design, with experience using Canva, and a comprehensive understanding of creating and managing effective social media ads on platforms like Meta and TikTok.



Key Responsibilities:



 • Develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement across all social media platforms.

 • Create compelling video content for platforms such as Instagram Reels and TikTok, ensuring alignment with brand voice and messaging.

 • Design eye-catching graphics using Canva and other design tools to support social media posts and campaigns.

 • Plan, create, and manage social media ad campaigns on Meta 
 and Instagram) and TikTok.

 • Structure and organize ad campaigns within ad accounts for maximum efficiency and effectiveness.

 • Utilize best practices for targeting and posting ads to reach the desired audience.

 • Analyze and report on the performance of social media campaigns, providing actionable insights and recommendations for improvement.

 • Report key metrics related to social media performance and ad campaigns.

 • Innovate and establish processes for content creation and social media management where none currently exist.

 • Generate effective campaigns that align with marketing goals and target audience.

 • Work independently and proactively, taking initiative to generate content without micromanagement.

 • Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices to ensure Flow remains at the forefront of the industry.



Qualifications:



 • Proven experience as a Social Media Manager, specifically within the SaaS industry.

 • Strong portfolio showcasing video content creation for Instagram Reels and TikTok.

 • Proficiency in Canva and other graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.) or similar software.

 • Demonstrated experience in planning, creating, and managing social media ad campaigns on Meta and TikTok.

 • In-depth knowledge of ad account structuring, targeting best practices, and ad posting strategies.

 • Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.

 • Strong communication and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

 • Ability to report key metrics and performance indicators related to social media and ad campaigns.

 • Self-starter mentality with a proven ability to work independently and innovate processes.

 • Creativity and a keen eye for detail.

 • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Graphic Design, or a related field is preferred.



Why Join Us:



 • Opportunity to work with a passionate and innovative team.

 • Competitive salary and benefits package.

 • Flexible working hours and remote work options.

 • Career growth opportunities within a fast-growing company.



How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, a cover letter detailing their relevant experience, and a portfolio of their work, particularly showcasing video content for Instagram Reels and TikTok, and social media ads, to [Your
 Address].



Flow is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

? Experience with n8n (or Make / Zapier) — comfortable connecting APIs and troubleshooting workflows

title: AI Solutions Associate
description:
Join our innovative AI Champions Team™ at Sevron as an AI Solutions Associate. In this role, you will work closely with various departments to identify opportunities for AI integration to enhance and build new processes. You will collaborate with teams to implement existing AI tools, develop new AI solutions, and work with the AI development team to create bespoke tools. Your focus will be on automating processes, enhancing operations, and improving efficiency through intelligent AI solutions.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:



Continuous Improvement

• Evaluate and refine Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) to identify and implement AI-driven enhancements.

• Continuously seek opportunities for process improvement through AI.



Automation

• Develop AI tools to automate routine tasks, freeing up human resources for strategic functions.

• Streamline operations and reduce dependency on manual inputs through intelligent automation solutions.



Enhancement

• Enhance service delivery and operational outputs across departments through smart technology.

• Identify opportunities to implement AI-driven solutions that improve efficiency and reduce costs.



Efficiency

• Optimise processes to achieve higher efficiency, reduced costs, and quicker turnaround times.

• Boost overall productivity and operational agility across the company.



AI Integration and Solution Development

• Collaborate with various departments to understand their processes and identify areas where AI can provide improvements or build new processes.

• Evaluate and implement existing AI tools to enhance departmental operations.

• Develop new AI solutions tailored to specific departmental needs.

• Work closely with the AI development team to create bespoke AI tools and solutions.



Technical Analysis and Problem-Solving

• Conduct technical analysis to determine the best AI solutions for different processes.

• Utilise problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and optimise AI applications.

• Continuously update and enhance AI functionalities to match evolving business and technological landscapes.



Collaboration and Communication

• Work closely with the Operations team, ensuring an unbiased approach towards departmental improvements.

• Provide regular updates (weekly/bi-weekly/monthly) to the Operations team on progress, insights, and AI integration challenges.

• Communicate effectively with stakeholders to ensure AI initiatives align with business goals.

• Work with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions.





QUALIFICATIONS:

• Strong problem-solving skills and technical analysis capabilities.

• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

• Ability to work collaboratively with different departments and teams.

• Passion for technology and AI-driven solutions.

• Some knowledge of coding (optional).



BENEFITS:

• Competitive salary and opportunities for advancement

• Comprehensive training and ongoing professional development

• A collaborative and supportive team environment

• The chance to make a meaningful impact on customer satisfaction and success

• Exciting opportunities for career growth within our organisation



If you’re ready to be a part of a team and are eager to pursue a path of continuous learning and career growth, we encourage you to apply and join us. Send your CV to

description:
Are you a high-speed graphic designer who thrives in a fast-paced agency environment? Do you have an eye for what makes people stop scrolling and click?



We are a fast-paced digital performance marketing agency scaling aggressively on Meta 
 & Instagram). We generate a massive volume of high-converting creative assets daily, and we are looking for a highly organized, efficient, and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to join our "engine room."



The Role

This is a Creative Executive role focused on high-output production. You won't just be making "pretty" pictures; you will be the driving force ensuring hundreds of high-performing ads—like the direct-response ads we run—are produced and checked for compliance without errors every single day.



Key Responsibilities

High-Volume Ad Creation: Rapidly produce static images (Canva style) based on proven winning hooks.



Compliance & Quality Control: Follow strict SOPs to ensure all ads meet Meta’s compliance standards while maintaining high visual impact.



Data-Driven Organization: Update internal tracking sheets daily to confirm creative counts and ensure all files are organized in the correct folders for the media buying team.



Must-Haves

Agency Experience: At least 6 months of experience working as a graphic designer within a marketing agency.



Efficiency & Speed: You are comfortable with repetitive tasks and are constantly finding ways to optimize your workflow to work faster without sacrificing quality.



Detail-Oriented: You spot typos and compliance "red flags" before they ever reach the client.



Tech-Savvy: You are comfortable navigating modern creative stacks and digital organization tools.

title: Customer Success Specialist
description:
Do you find joy in building meaningful client relationships, supporting their success, and being a trusted guide as they reach their goals? If you’re someone who thrives on connection and collaboration, we’d be delighted to welcome you to our team!



About Us:



Kalicube is a premium Digital Branding Consultancy for entrepreneurs in the AI era. Leveraging 9.4 billion data points, Kalicube gives entrepreneurs unprecedented control over how they're represented to decision-makers online through visible, influential personal brands that open doors rather than close them. Kalicube is the powerhouse of Knowledge Panel and Brand SERP services.



Job Summary:



At Kalicube, our clients’ success is at the heart of everything we do. As a Customer Success Specialist, you’ll be their trusted advocate, helping them achieve their Brand SERP and Knowledge Panel goals. This role is all about building lasting relationships, providing proactive support, and guiding clients so they gain the full value of Kalicube’s services and the Kalicube Pro SaaS platform.



Your Key Responsibilities:



Be the primary point of contact for a portfolio of Kalicube clients, fostering trust and strong relationships.

Lead onboarding for new clients, ensuring they feel confident and supported from day one.

Proactively connect with clients to understand their goals and help them get the most out of Kalicube’s services and software.

Manage essential account setup and maintenance tasks, such as accurately classifying page types in the Kalicube Pro platform.

Create and adapt client-specific playbooks (using company templates) to provide clear, tailored roadmaps.

Respond promptly and helpfully to client questions via
, chat, and video calls.

Share best practices on Brand SERPs and Knowledge Panels using Kalicube’s proven methodology.

Monitor client health and platform usage to identify and address potential issues early.

Collect and share client feedback to support continuous improvement of our products and services.

Keep accurate, detailed records of client interactions and progress in our CRM.



Skills and Traits:



Excellent written and spoken English with proactive and clear communication.

Strong interpersonal skills with a genuine passion for relationships, empathy, and helping others succeed.

Highly organized with the ability to balance client-facing and internal tasks effectively.

Careful attention to detail, especially in process-driven work like data classification and documentation.

Professional maturity and resilience — able to stay composed and positive in a fast-paced environment.

Logical, objective approach to solving problems and making decisions.

Comfortable learning and working with new software platforms quickly.

Previous experience in customer service, customer success, or account management is a plus, but not required.

Genuine interest in digital marketing, SEO, or online brand management.



What Kalicube Offers:



Work Arrangement: 100% remote, 40 hours a week

Starting Salary: 91USD/week, paid weekly

Salary Review: After 3 months subject for salary increase

Internet Subsidy: Paid monthly, after 3 months

Paid Vacation: 2 weeks of paid vacation after 12 months

SSS, Pag-ibig and PhilHealth: Contributions paid monthly, after 3 months

Bonus: 13th-month bonus, prorated

Career Growth: Opportunities for long-term growth within the company

Work Atmosphere: Courageous, smart, fun, family-friendly, and diverse.



You won’t just join a team—you’ll be part of a supportive family that truly cares about your growth and success. If you’re ready to share your Customer Success expertise with a company that values people as much as client outcomes, we’d be excited to receive your application!

title: Procurement Officer (for Amazon Private Label)
description:
About our company:



We are a European-based E-commerce company with 9 private label brands. We are looking for new products for which the packaging design is not done efficiently. We then make it more efficient, and this gives us a competitive advantage. For that development process, we sometimes have to change the product design, open new factory molds, or need to come up with other creative solutions. When our products are developed (by you in collaboration with a Chinese factory) and produced, our Supply Chain management from China to Europe works as follows: We usually have one 40ft EXW shipment per month from China to Europe that is set for a specific departure date. For this shipment, all orders from different suppliers (with production times ranging from 15-60 days) should arrive in time. All information (CI and PL) from all suppliers must be combined so that the customs clearance process is easy. This entire process is not documented in the form of SOPs yet, so we will have to create them together during the first month.



What We Are Looking For :



We are seeking an experienced professional who can take ownership of the entire product development and logistics process. (Initially a part-time role, with full-time opportunities potentially becoming available later.)



Your responsibilities will include:

- Product development and sourcing from China

- Minimum of 5 years of experience in private label procurement.

- Product quality control

- Ensuring efficient packaging and carton sizing

- Accounting support, including creating and verifying invoices

- Supply chain planning

- Managing lead times and shipping timelines (minimum 5 years of experience required).

- Supply forecasting and inventory management

- Managing international shipments



(You will be responsible for overseeing the full workflow—from product development to logistics coordination.)



You must have:



- At least 5 years of experience working with Chinese suppliers for FBA and private label businesses

- Advanced proficiency in Excel/Google Sheets

- Experience in data analysis

- Proven experience managing international shipments



What You Will Get:

Work mostly during Philippine hours to stay in contact with China, but you will also need to be available in the evening (until 22:00–00:00 PH time) to communicate with our European-based office.



*How to apply (we can only accept candidates who applied using the application form)

*Make sure to include your portfolio link in the application form




 . gle /ooUdxu2pjqHbQnap8



1. Copy and paste the form into your browser

2. Leave no spaces behind

title: Associate Graphic Designer
description:
SBFM are a Facilities Management business operating in the UK.



We are looking for an Associate Graphic Designer with sharp ideas and an eye for detail. If you love turning concepts into eye-catching visuals and want to be part of a collaborative, fast-moving team, this is your chance. You’ll help shape how our brand shows up across digital and print - bringing creativity, consistency, and a bit of flair to everything you touch.



Duties and Responsibilities

• Design of impactful marketing assets, including:

- Social media visuals for LinkedIn and Instagram.

-
 templates for both internal and external communications.

- Logo creation for new business ventures

• Produce layouts/design solutions for the following:

- Brochures

- Reports

- Support Bids & Tenders

- Cleaning Specifications

- Information Posters

title: Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist (Search & Social)
description:
Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist (Search & Social)

Remote — Philippines | Full-Time

About SocialScience

SocialScience is a growth marketing agency that manages paid search and paid social campaigns for high-growth brands across B2B and DTC. We specialize in performance-driven creative testing and media strategy designed to reduce customer acquisition costs and scale revenue.

We are hiring a Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist to become the central data engine behind all client performance reporting across platforms.

This is not a virtual assistant role. This is a performance marketing analytics role for someone who understands how ad platforms work and how to read, organize, and interpret paid media data.



Role Overview

You will be responsible for pulling, organizing, and analyzing performance data across multiple advertising platforms three times per week (Monday, Wednesday, Friday). You will maintain standardized reporting across clients, identify performance trends, and support our media buying team with clean, reliable data that helps drive decisions.

Over time, you will also help build cross-client insights, creative performance tracking, audit preparation, and budget pacing systems.

You will become the data nerve center for all SocialScience clients.



Key Responsibilities

Core Reporting (Primary Responsibility)

Pull performance reports from:

Google Ads

Meta Ads Manager

LinkedIn Campaign Manager

TikTok Ads Manager

Google Analytics (GA4)

Update master reporting sheets for all clients (3x per week)

Maintain consistent, accurate data across all client reporting templates

Build and maintain pivot tables to analyze:

CPA trends

CTR, CPC, CVR performance

Creative performance

Audience performance

Budget pacing by platform

Identify unusual performance changes and flag them to media buyers

Media Buyer Support

Prepare data sheets before optimization sessions

Maintain historical data for trend analysis

Support quarterly planning with performance summaries

Assist in forecasting and budget pacing sheets

Audit & Case Study Preparation

Pull last 60–90 days of structured data for new client audits

Maintain “before and after” performance data for case studies

Organize campaign structure and performance summaries for strategy reviews

Creative & Audience Insights (Advanced Responsibility)

Track which creatives and audiences perform best across clients

Maintain a creative performance library

Identify patterns across accounts that inform strategy



Required Experience & Skills

3+ years experience working with paid media platforms in an agency or in-house role

Strong working knowledge of:

Google Ads

Meta Ads Manager

LinkedIn Campaign Manager

Google Analytics (GA4)

Advanced proficiency in Excel and Google Sheets

Pivot tables (required)

Excel Formulas and data organization

Deep understanding of:

CPA, CPC, CTR, CVR, ROAS

Campaign ? Ad Set ? Ad structure

How performance data should be interpreted

Experience pulling reports directly from ad platforms

Extremely detail-oriented and process-driven



Nice to Have (Bonus Skills)

Looker Studio / Google Data Studio

Supermetrics or other data connectors

Understanding of UTMs and tracking structure

Experience creating standardized reporting templates



What Success Looks Like in This Role

Within 60 days, you will:

Own reporting for all SocialScience clients

Have standardized reporting templates across accounts

Provide media buyers with clean data before they begin optimizations

Identify performance issues before the team does

Maintain historical data that makes audits and case studies easy



You Are a Great Fit If You

Love working with data and spreadsheets

Notice patterns in numbers quickly

Prefer organized systems over messy information

Can follow processes exactly and consistently

Have worked inside ad platforms and understand how campaigns function

Take pride in accuracy and reliability



Working Schedule

Must be available during overlapping hours with U.S. Eastern Time

Reporting cadence: Monday, Wednesday, Friday



How to apply:

1. Send your Portfolio and Resume to: 

2. Tell us a story of a significant event in your life that has shaped you





See you!

title: SEO Strategist & Account Manager
description:
Hawk IQ is a U.S.-based digital marketing agency that helps small businesses grow smarter and faster through data-driven SEO strategies, website optimization, AI Visibility (GEO) and Google Business Profile (GBP) management. We work with the Go High Level (GHL) CRM platform. We focus on clients needing Websites, CRM, Content Creation, Local & AI Visibility. 



We are expanding our remote team in the Philippines.



ROLE OVERVIEW:

We are hiring a proactive leader and skilled SEO Strategist to join our team. This role combines local Search Engine Optimization & AI strategy experience, client management, and continuous learning.



Initial responsibilities will require account management until revenues require an account manager. This role, with the right leadership skills, will have the opportunity to build a team and be responsible for its growth and profitability. The ideal candidate will be compensated well for that work. 



RESPONSIBILITIES:

 - Optimize Client Google Business Profiles (GBP) & AI Visibility (AIO / GEO) 

 - Conduct SEO audits, KW research, and competitor analysis for prospective clients

 - Implement on-page, off-page, and technical SEO strategies

 - Create backlinks and manage link-building campaigns

 - Manage and oversee SEO-friendly content

 - Coordinate client campaigns and reporting

 - Proactively stay updated on SEO and Google algorithm changes



QUALIFICATIONS:

- 2+ years SEO experience (small business preferred)

 - Strong knowledge of GBP optimization, on-page & off-page SEO

 - Experience with SEO tools (GA4, GTM, GSC, SEMrush, Ahrefs, etc.)

 - Excellent English communication skills

 - Organized and able to manage multiple clients

 - Google Sheets, Docs & Go High Level CRM experience required 



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS:

 - First 30 days (Trial): $650 USD

 - 60–90 days (Advanced Trial): $850 USD

 - 90–180 days (Full Employment after performance of skills): $1,050 - $1,250 / month (QTR Bonus based on performance reviews) 

 - Long-term, remote position with growth opportunities

 - Flexible hours (must overlap some U.S. time)

 - Candidate responsible for own ongoing training and development



IMPORTANT REQUIREMENTS:

 - Must work exclusively for Hawk IQ (no other agency / freelance work allowed)

 - Reliable internet connection with backup

 - Full focus and dedication to Hawk IQ clients



WHY JOIN US?

Be part of a growing digital marketing agency where your skills directly impact small business success. If you prove your work and skill, you will be compensated above PH market rates. If you are ready to grow your career in Digital Marketing, help build a great team and earn a competitive salary, we want to hear from you!

title: Amazon Account Manager / Operations Manager
description:
Are you a strategic, data-driven brand builder with a passion for Amazon?

We are a fast-growing Amazon private label brand looking for a full-time Amazon Account Manager to take ownership of our product development pipeline, listing optimization, and brand positioning.



You’ll play a key leadership role in launching products, optimizing conversion rates, and developing a strong, consistent brand presence. This is a long-term opportunity with potential for growth in a collaborative, performance-driven environment.



Key Responsibilities

-Accountability & Ownership

-Lead and maintain a robust product development pipeline (from idea to launch)

-Optimize product listings for maximum visibility and conversions

-Manage all branding, positioning, and messaging efforts

-Implement CRO strategies and run continuous A/B tests

-Coordinate freelancers (designers, photographers, content creators)

-Monitor and improve brand health metrics: rankings, reviews, CTR, CR, etc.



Daily & Weekly Tasks

-Research product trends and discover new product ideas

-Analyze competitors for differentiation and CRO opportunities

-Track performance: sessions, conversion rates, sales rank

-Collaborate with supply chain, PPC, and creative teams to align launch and inventory strategies



Long-Term Projects & Goals

-Build a consistent and strategic brand identity across all customer touchpoints

-Establish a repeatable, scalable system for product launches

-Increase customer loyalty and retention through compelling branding and messaging



 Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

KPI 1: Product Development Pipeline

Objective: Develop and maintain a validated pipeline of launch-ready products

Metrics: 

-Number of product ideas researched and validated monthly

-Number of products launched per quarter

-First 90-day sales & review performance



Actions:

-Run research & validation using Helium 10 and market analysis

-Coordinate with suppliers, creatives, and PPC

-Maintain and update Product Pipeline Tracker



KPI 2: Conversion Rate Optimization

Objective: Improve listing performance through CRO strategies

Metric: Conversion Rate (%) from Amazon Business Reports

Actions:

-Optimize listings, copy, and A+ content

-Improve visuals and run split tests

-Monitor and iterate based on data and performance feedback



 Qualifications & Skills

Required:

-3+ years of experience managing private label brands on Amazon

-Proven success with multiple product launches

-Deep understanding of Amazon SEO and the Amazon algorithm

-Expertise in Helium 10, keyword research, and listing optimization

-Skilled in briefing and coordinating designers and content teams

-Familiarity with A+ content, storefront management, and conversion tracking



Preferred:

-Background in marketing, branding, or e-commerce growth strategy

-Knowledge of CRO tools and testing platforms (e.g., ManageByStats, Splitly)

-Experience using tools like Asana, Notion, or Trello for project management

-Awareness of PPC’s influence on organic ranking



 Soft Skills:

-High attention to detail and ownership mentality

-Strong marketing sense and customer-centric thinking

-Excellent written and verbal English communication

-Organized, self-driven, and proactive

-Analytical mindset – able to turn data into decisions



 What We Offer

-Competitive rates

-Fully remote, flexible working hours

-Bi-weekly payments and performance reviews

-Long-term role with growth potential

-Paid leave and additional benefits after 6 months (SSS, Pag-ibig, health insurance)

-Supportive team culture with room for innovation and contribution

-Training resources and personal development opportunities



 How to Apply:

1. Include in subject line: “[Your Favorite Book] - Amazon Brand Manager Application”

2. Attach your updated resume

3. Include a short video (2–3 min) introducing yourself and describing your:

-Experience with Amazon product research

-Tools you’ve used and how you used them

-One product you’ve helped launch and what made it successful

4. Complete the internet speed test from speedtest.net and attach a screenshot

5. Attach a screenshot with your computer specs.



Why Join Us?

This is more than just a brand management job. It’s an opportunity to lead, build, and scale something meaningful. If you’re driven by impact, autonomy, and a clear path to success, we’d love to meet you.

title: Senior Client Services Coordinator (Debt Collection & Client Management)
description:
Job Description

Company: Priority Haulage Limited

Job Title: Client Services Coordinator

Job Type: Remote – Part-Time

Location: Auckland, New Zealand

Reports To: Financial Operations Manager

Start Date: Immediately



About Priority Haulage

Priority Haulage is a reputable and reliable heavy machinery and equipment transport business based in Auckland, New Zealand. We specialise in the safe and efficient transportation of a wide range of civil machinery and heavy access equipment. 

Our company motto, “Your Assets, Our Priority”, reflects our commitment to the secure and dependable movement of our clients’ valuable machinery. We take pride in delivering a high level of client satisfaction through trusted service and operational excellence.



Job Summary

The Client Services Coordinator is a commercially focused support role responsible for driving disciplined debt collection, structured client onboarding, and consistent sales follow-up to protect cashflow, support client retention, and strengthen long-term client relationships.

This role operates as a key link between finance, sales, and operations, ensuring clients are onboarded correctly, followed up consistently, and managed professionally across their lifecycle.



Role Overview

• Approx. 15-20 hours per week

• Availability is required during standard NZ business hours, with consistent daily availability from no later than 5:00 AM PHT / 10:00 AM NZT.

• Increased availability and a firmer commitment are required between the 20th and 5th to support 20th-of-month due-date collections and payment follow-up cycles.



Job Responsibilities



Debt Collection Management

• Own and manage the end-to-end debt collection process, including:

? Same-day payment follow-ups

? 7-day outstanding account follow-ups

? 20th of the following month collections

• Maintain accurate debtor tracking and reporting, ensuring visibility of overdue accounts and risk exposure.

• Liaise closely with the Financial Operations Manager to escalate risks, resolve disputes, and align on collection strategy.

• Support invoicing follow-ups and payment confirmation to maintain strong cashflow discipline.

• Ensure all financial communications with clients remain professional, consistent, and documented.



Client Onboarding and Management

• Own the client onboarding process end-to-end, ensuring:

? Accurate capture of client details

? Credit and compliance information is completed

? Clients are correctly set up across internal systems

• Manage and maintain the lead generation board, ensuring:

? Leads are updated, progressed, or closed out accurately

? Clear visibility of pipeline status and follow-up actions

• Design, implement, and manage client feedback mechanisms (e.g. surveys, post-service feedback) to support service improvement.

• Maintain clean, structured client data to support reporting, relationship management, and future sales activity.

• Act as a client coordination point for non-operational enquiries, ensuring timely resolution or escalation.



Sales Support

• Support lead management and follow-up activities, including:

? First-service follow-ups.

? Lost-lead follow-ups.

? Warm re-engagement of dormant clients.

• Maintain and refine call and follow-up scripts to ensure consistent, professional client communication.

• Coordinate with sales and operations to ensure client expectations are aligned with service delivery.

• Provide visibility on lead conversion gaps and recurring client objections.



Ad Hoc & Continuous Improvement 

• Support workflow automation and process improvement initiatives.

• Assist the Financial Operations Manager with non-technical accounting and administrative tasks as required.

• Support resolution of client issues and escalations, ensuring matters are documented and outcomes tracked.

• Contribute to system and process improvements that reduce friction and improve client experience.



Required Experience & Capability

• 7+ years’ experience in client services, administration, or operations coordination roles

• Demonstrated experience working with New Zealand and/or Australian businesses, with a clear understanding of local commercial practices and client expectations.

• Proven experience in debt collection, with a track record of securing on-time payments and reducing overdue accounts.

• Strong written and verbal English communication skills.

• Demonstrated ability to work cross-functionally with finance, sales, and operations teams while managing and adhering to structured processes.

• High proficiency in Microsoft Excel and Microsoft 365.

• Ability to work independently, remotely, and with minimal supervision.



Preferred Experience & Qualifications

• Experience in transport, logistics, fleet, or heavy industry environments is advantageous.

• Familiarity with systems and tools used in a systems-driven operations environment, including:

? Xero

? Notion

? ChatGPT

? Fillout or similar form and workflow automation tools

• A degree or diploma in finance, business administration, or a related field is preferred.

• Professional certifications in finance, accounting, or client relationship management are advantageous.

• Xero certification or certification in similar accounting software is advantageous.



Personal Attributes

• Highly organised and detail-oriented.

• Strong interpersonal and stakeholder communication skills.

• Proactive, self-motivated, and comfortable owning outcomes.

• Strong deadline, compliance, and follow-through discipline.

• Client-focused with a high standard of professionalism and integrity.

• Adaptable and open to change, systems, and process improvement.

• Maintains discretion when handling sensitive financial and client information.



Required Equipment and Setup

• Dedicated Workspace: Quiet, distraction-free home office suitable for video calls and focused work.

• Computer Requirements (Desktop PC or Laptop):

o Processor: Intel Core i5 or better.

o RAM: Minimum 8GB (16GB preferred).

o Operating System: Windows 10/11, compatible with required business software.

o Internet: Stable high-speed connection (minimum 10 Mbps download/upload).

• Monitor Setup: Dual monitors preferred, or a laptop paired with an external monitor.

• Headset: Noise-cancelling for clear communication during virtual meetings.

• Webcam: High-quality external or integrated camera for video calls.

• Power Backup: Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) or generator ensuring at least 3 hours of operational uptime during outages.

• Internet Backup: Secondary internet connection (e.g., mobile data or alternative wireless) for uninterrupted connectivity.

title: Make + API Specialist | Senior Automation Engineer for Project Work
description:
Job Description

Company: Priority Haulage Limited

Role Title: Automation Engineer

Location: Remote

Reports to: Financial Controller (Technical Project Manager)

Start Date: Immediately



About Priority Haulage

Priority Haulage is a well-established heavy machinery and equipment transport business based in Auckland, New Zealand. We specialise in the safe and efficient movement of civil machinery and heavy access equipment.



Our motto, “Your Assets, Our Priority”, reflects our commitment to consistently delivering value to our clients through service reliability, precision, and operational excellence.



As the business continues to evolve, we are investing in smarter systems and automation to support scale, accuracy, and efficiency.



About the Project

We are planning an initial invoicing automation initiative using Make to streamline workflows across our core operating systems: MyTrucking, ChatGPT, and Xero.



This initial project is intended as a foundational, production-grade automation, designed to deliver immediate practical value while enabling further automation opportunities across the business, including tools such as WhatsApp, Deputy, Notion, and Fillout, as well as within our marketing function.



We are seeking an experienced automation specialist or integrator to review the scope, validate feasibility, and support the design and implementation of the workflow. 



The role requires dependable availability, independent execution, and consistent delivery within agreed timeframes, and is not suitable for candidates balancing full-time employment or significant competing commitments.



Role Overview

You will help implement a multi-step automated workflow, with responsibilities including:



•	Mapping and documenting system-to-system data flows.

•	Building, testing, and iterating workflows in 
.

•	Handling API calls, payloads, and JSON transformations.

•	Advising on workflow limitations, error handling, monitoring, and optimisation.

•	Carrying out testing, using team support where appropriate, with sound reliability and security practices.

•	Providing practical input on scalability and next-step automation opportunities.



Required Skills & Experience

Non-Negotiable

•	Proven, hands-on experience with 
.

•	Strong working knowledge of REST APIs (experience with Postman a plus.

•	Solid understanding of JSON, field mapping, and transformations.

•	Comfortable working with complex datasets, including financial and operational data.

•	Experience working in fast-moving operational environments (e.g. logistics, transport, or adjacent industries), or demonstrated ability to learn quickly in similar contexts.

•	Experience integrating OpenAI models into automation workflows.



Preferred

•	Experience with Xero API, accounting systems, or financial integrations

•	High level of technical proficiency, including the Microsoft platform, with working familiarity in modern business tools such as Notion and L



Ways of Working

You’ll likely be a good fit if you:



•	Are an independent, capable problem-solver.

•	Are comfortable working with loosely defined problems and bringing structure.

•	Can translate requirements into working solutions.

•	Communicate clearly and pragmatically to ensure deliverables are met.

•	Prefer building and shipping over theory.



Enviroment & Culture

We operate in a performance-based environment, with a culture that is:



•	Healthy, competitive, and collaborative

•	Practical and execution-focused

•	Structured, with clear goals and task management

•	Low bureaucracy, high ownership

•	No micromanagement, autonomy is expected and respected



Next Steps

If you’re interested, please share:



•	A brief introduction and your CV.

•	Clear examples of API-driven Make automations built and the business outcomes achieved.



Shortlisted candidates will be invited to an initial interview session for further discussion.

title: Senior Freelance Creative / Grahpic Designer (Ad-hoc, Execution-Focused)
description:
Job Description

Company: Priority Haulage Limited

Engagement Title: Creative Designer

Engagement Type: Remote - Freelance / Contract Engagement 

Reports to: Financial Controller (and Transport Operations Officer)

Start Date: Immediately



About Priority Haulage

Priority Haulage is a reputable and reliable heavy machinery and equipment transport business based in Auckland, New Zealand. We specialise in the safe and efficient transportation of a wide range of civil machinery and heavy access equipment. 



Our company motto, “Your Assets, Our Priority”, reflects our commitment to the secure and dependable movement of our clients’ valuable machinery. We take pride in delivering a high level of client satisfaction through trusted service and operational excellence.



Engagement Overview

Priority Haulage is seeking a capable and dependable Creative Designer to support ongoing brand execution across digital and print channels within a fast-paced, growing business.



This is an ad-hoc, task-based role, with work arising as needed, primarily across social media visuals, website updates, and marketing collateral.



This role suits a designer who can reliably step in as required, work independently, and deliver clean, accurate outputs within agreed timeframes; it is not suited to candidates whose availability is constrained by full-time employment or competing priorities.



This is a delivery-focused engagement (not strategic ownership). Work is assigned on a task-by-task basis, with no guaranteed hours, and workload will vary depending on business needs.



Job Responsibilities

Social Media Visuals

• Prepare static and simple animated graphics for scheduled posts.

• Apply existing brand guidelines consistently across all assets.

• Deliver publication-ready files in the required formats and dimensions.

• No content strategy, copywriting, or performance analysis required — visual assets only.



Collateral Management

• Update and maintain existing collateral (PDFs, brochures, price lists, booklets).

• Apply text, layout, and formatting updates accurately and consistently.

• Ensure all final exports are fully reviewed before publication.

• Export, version, and publish final files correctly, with no redundant pages or legacy content.

• Maintain clear version control and naming conventions.



Website Updates (Squarespace)

• Perform minor content updates only (text, images, layout adjustments).

• Follow existing site structure, templates, and styling.

• Ensure visual consistency across pages after updates.

• No redesign, development work, SEO, or performance optimisation required.



Process & System Management

• Conduct a final self-review on all deliverables prior to submission or publication.

• Ensure all working files and final assets are stored in the agreed OneDrive structure.

• Transfer editable source files (not just published outputs) upon task completion.

• Follow established publishing and handover processes without prompting.

• Flag blockers or uncertainties early rather than post-delivery.



Required Experience & Capability

This role requires demonstrated experience operating at a senior execution level in a fast-paced, accountability-driven environment. Applicants should meet the majority of the criteria below:



• 5+ years’ hands-on experience in graphic design, brand execution, or marketing operations within a commercial environment.

• Proven experience delivering production-ready outputs (social media assets, PDFs, and brochures) with minimal rework.

• Strong working knowledge of brand systems and visual consistency, including typography, spacing, layout, and publishing standards.

• Practical experience managing and maintaining live business assets, not just concept or campaign work.

• Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Cloud, particularly:

   o InDesign

   o Illustrator

   o Photoshop

• Confident working with Squarespace (content updates, layout adjustments, asset management).

• Demonstrated ability to operate independently in a remote environment, with strong self-management, reliability, and consistent follow-through without supervision.

• High level of technical proficiency across modern business tools, including:

   o Notion

   o ChatGPT

   o Microsoft 365 (Outlook, OneDrive, Teams)

   o Loom (when required for handover or explanation)



Preferred / Advantageous Experience 

While not mandatory, the following would be considered a strong advantage for future contribution:



• Basic HTML/CSS knowledge for minor content adjustments within an existing CMS (not required for day-to-day work).

• Exposure to transport, logistics, or operations-based businesses, where accuracy, consistency, and clarity are critical.

• Experience supporting brand rollout or consolidation phases, operating within established brand guidelines.

• Strong asset and file management practices, including version control and maintaining shared collateral libraries.

• Webflow experience, including CMS usage and layout structuring; custom development experience is a plus for future platform evolution but not required initially.

• Experience working alongside marketing or growth teams, with a clear execution focus rather than ownership of strategy.



Personal Attributes

• Highly organised and detail-oriented, with strong self-review habits and the ability to manage multiple creative deliverables reliably.

• Clear and professional communicator, able to operate autonomously in a remote environment while collaborating effectively with stakeholders.

• Strong visual judgement and problem-solving capability, particularly in identifying layout, consistency, and publishing issues before submission.

• Proactive and improvement-oriented, with the ability to refine workflows, adapt to feedback, and maintain quality under delivery pressure.

• Professional, client-focused mindset, demonstrating ownership, high execution standards, and accountability for final outputs.



Application Requirement

A portfolio link is required. Please include examples of brand, collateral, and digital design work relevant to this role.

title: Salesforce Systems Administrator
description:
COMPANY: MVP MAILHOUSE

Located in Park City, UT, MVP Mailhouse is a leader in direct marketing and analytics that drive ROI, specializing in the dental industry. Read more about MVP Mailhouse’s products and services on our website: 
/.



MVP Mailhouse’s flagship product is direct mail marketing with unexpectedly advanced technology. We track all the phone calls and new customer conversations that our marketing campaigns generate for our customers and help them use that data to increase performance. We have started offering digital ad campaigns on Google and
 to help our customers maximize their growth.



MVP Mailhouse uses proprietary technology including native mobile and web-based applications to make our customer experience more streamlined and effective and to help practices achieve their growth goals.



TEAM: PRODUCT and ENGINEERING

Our development team uses kanban and Scru
thodologies to manage our workflow. Our stack is React for web, Node.js back end, Mongo DB, and several REST APIs for other functionality.



The focus of the product and engineering team is building cross-device compatible user interfaces that communicate effectively and make action painless and instinctual. Our entire team is laser focused on understanding our customers’ problems, preferences, and feedback in order to build a product that they love and helps fuel our company’s growth.



POSITION: SALESFORCE ADMINISTRATOR

The Salesforce Administrator will take part in the design, development, and support of the various platforms in the organization. The position will interact with business users, IT resources, and provide advanced in-depth CRM administration and design. The successful hire will support multiple business divisions and collaborate with stakeholders to shape CRM requirements, integration, and ensure alignment with business and IT strategy.



You will also be responsible for designing the system, training employees on the system, troubleshooting software problems, and making improvements to the system over time.



Our system is based on the following software:



- Salesforce

- GSuite (Gmail, Drive, Calendar, etc)

- Quickbooks

- Zapier



RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Help develop and execute the technical roadmap for CRM and system integration, working closely with system users to leverage the platform further to develop and achieve the aim of the CRM and its full integration to the organization’s processes

- Evaluate and configure CRM and other systems

- Training users and creating useful documentation

- Drive user adoption of newly implemented features and functionality; increase the utilization of the CRM through user engagement, develop CRM workflows to support business processes, extract data, produce tailored reports and respond to members’ information requests

- Ensure proper integration of various systems and automation platforms

- Play a strategic consulting role during the planning of various marketing campaigns both at the level of targeting as well as that of business intelligence

- Develop and administer CRM marketing lists, maintaining the data records of all membership engagements and prospective membership including all relevant key contacts, ensuring data supplied is up to date



REQUIREMENTS:

- Bachelor’s degree; preferably in business or technology-related field

- Solid years of professional experience in IT and/or related business experience

- Extensive experience in configuring Salesforce and other CRMs using workflows, validation rules, roles & profiles, reports, and dashboards with demonstrated advanced proficiency

- Proven ability to develop a clear understanding of internal clients’ needs and the capability to incorporate them into processes and solutions

- A good facilitator with a strong personality and relationship management ability to communicate, influence and collaborate with multiple stakeholders



DETAILS:

- Status: Full-time (~40 hrs per week)

- Work hours: US business hours (PH night shift)

- Location: Virtual team (work from home)



BENEFITS:

- 11 Paid regional/religious holidays per year

- 12 PTO days per year (accrued incrementally with pay periods)

- Healthcare reimbursement for a tea
mber

- 13th-month bonus (prorated by service length)

- Monthly internet reimbursement

- Quarterly performance bonus
salary: Max of $1,500 per month; open for dis...

title: Content Feedback Manager (Giving Feedback): $1,000–$1,200 USD START RATE
description:
Start rate: $800 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,000–$1,200 a month)



Paid twice per month via Wise.



ABOUT US







Young Publisher is an international digital marketing company working with content creators and online brands.



BENEFITS

- Full-time position: 8 hours daily, Monday-Friday; 40 hours a week

- Flexible schedule: Choose your own hours, as long as you show up for the daily meeting (MANDATORY)

- Stable income: Long-term role with regular, on-time payments

- Supportive team: Collaborative environment without micromanagement

- Growth path: Opportunities to increase responsibilities and earnings

- 100% remote: Work-from-home setup



TASKS



- Content & Client Feedback

- Review 30-60 short-form client videos (Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts) per day in our Slack feedback channel -before they are published

- Give constructive, actionable feedback on hooks (verbal/headline/visual), scripting, pacing, editing, and CTA, making sure each client knows exactly how to improve

- Cross-reference each piece of content with client niche, experience, and goals as outlined in their files

- Review previous feedback to ensure consistency and avoid contradictions

- Quality-control content ideas created by our Content Research Experts before delivery to the client, ensuring fit with niche, experience, and likely performance

- Oversee workload balance among Content Research Experts and make sure no one on the team is overloaded or underutilized

- Respond to client questions or tech issues in Slack within 24 hours

- Be tough but fair—only approve content that meets quality standards



Progress Tracking



- Complete daily End-of-Day (EOD) reports

- Attend daily tea
eting (mandatory, 3pm CET)

- Keep internal feedback and client progress records up to date



REQUIREMENTS (MUST-HAVE)

- C1+ English (written), with perfect grammar and clear, professional responses

- Significant experience creating or reviewing short-form content for Instagram Reels, TikTok, or YouTube Shorts

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Reliable internet and a quiet, professional home workspace

- Accountability mindset and deadline commitment

- Long-term commitment, eager to master a workflow and have direct impact on client success



IMPORTANT



- When recording a Loom video as part of your application:

- Camera must show your FACE & SCREEN

- Treat it as a LIVE interview with the Hiring Manager

- Have a professional background

- Have clear audio

- Wear business-casual attire



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)



- Experience supporting creators and social media beginners, especially ages 45+

- Familiarity with AI tools like ChatGPT, CapCut, etc.

- Strong understanding of trends/strategy for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts



WHY JOIN US?



- Start rate: $800 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,000–$1,200 a month once trained)

Note: Senior CFMs earn $1,500+ after 6–12 months.

- Performance bonuses: Up to $400+ additional monthly based on:

- Quality and clarity of feedback

- Task completion and consistency

- Teamwork and responsibility

- Payments: Twice per month via Wise, direct to your bank

- Tools access: All tools/software fully covered

- Work-life balance: No graveyard shifts

- Professional growth: Frequent feedback and advanced training



HOW TO APPLY



1: Message us on OnlineJobs.ph with "CFM" as the message title



2: Include ONLY the following in your message:



#1: Your CV.

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

#3: Your years of experience with content feedback or coaching.

#4: One sentence on why you're a good fit for this role.

#5: Your portfolio (including examples of your feedback or video/content work).



Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.

title: Customer Operations Agent - Management Exp is a Plus!
description:
If you’re a Customer Operations Agent leader in fintech/lending and want to join a startup with major career growth opportunities, this role is for you!

Apply Here: 
/appqyBZJyyxs1htVk/pagYg48MNpIqaV148/form



As a Customer Operations Agent, you’ll be the friendly, trusted face of our brand—supporting customers with empathy and clarity whether they’re managing payments, reporting fraud, or simply need guidance. You’ll be a founding member of the Customer Service team and will play an increasingly important role as it grows.



This role is ideal for someone who started their career as a customer service agent and progressed into a leadership or management position, gaining hands-on experience while helping teams scale. Experience working with or within major financial institutions or fintechs such as Wells Fargo, JP Morgan, Starling Bank, or similar organizations is highly valued. We’re looking for someone who can bring both frontline expertise and leadership mindset to help shape our customer operations from the ground up.



IMPORTANT: Please carefully read the responsibilities below to ensure you're a good fit, and follow the instructions on how to apply at the bottom.



Compensation:

* Competitive salary: $1,200 – $1,400 USD per month (depending on experience)

* Opportunity to grow into a Team Lead/Manager position (with a raise) as the support team expands



Benefits:

* 100% Remote - work from anywhere in the Philippines.

* 15 days paid leave

* Bi-weekly salary payouts

* Paid time off and Philippine public holiday, listed here

* Supportive, startup-style culture where your ideas matter

* Clear growth path and strong learning opportunities in fintech



Working Hours:

* Monday, Tuesday, Friday: 12 PM – 9 PM UK time (8 PM – 5 AM PH time)

* Saturday, Sunday: 11 AM – 8 PM UK time (7 PM – 4 AM PH time)

* Wednesday & Thursday rest days

* This is a full time role only (40 hours per week)



Core Responsibilities

* Deliver exceptional multi-channel support (chat,
, and phone) with a focus on first-contact resolution and high customer satisfaction.

* Uphold brand standards by communicating clearly, consistently, and professionally in all interactions.

* Actively manage brand reputation by professionally responding to all customer reviews and public feedback.

* Handle and resolve customer complaints with empathy and efficiency, knowing when and how to appropriately escalate complex issues.

* Oversee customer repayments and collections by assisting with payment management, rescheduling, and account oversight with professionalism and care.

* Protect the business by proactively identifying, investigating, and escalating suspicious activity and potential fraud cases.

* Leverage AI-driven tools to streamline workflows, optimize response times, and enhance the quality of support delivered.

* Drive continuous improvement by gathering and sharing actionable customer insights with product and internal teams to enhance offerings and processes.



You’re Perfect for This Role If You

* Have proven experience in customer service, ideally within fintech, payments, or * lending (BNPL experience a plus).

* Understand fraud detection, repayments, and collections, with empathy for customers’ financial situations.

* Communicate effectively across chat,
, and phone, adapting tone and approach to each channel.

* Are tech-savvy and comfortable using AI tools and automation to streamline work.

* Thrive in a fast-paced, customer-first startup environment where priorities shift quickly.

* Are an empathetic problem solver with strong attention to detail, professionalism, and integrity.



How to Apply:

* Click the link below to submit your application and let's get started: 
/appqyBZJyyxs1htVk/pagYg48MNpIqaV148/form

title: React Native developer (Senior level)
description:
We're looking for a React Native Developer. You'll work side-by-side with our manager, designer, and team of engineer, helping and assisting with mobile app development, feature implementation, and testing.



What We're Looking For:

- Solid understanding of React Native fundamentals, such as components, state management, navigation, styling with Flexbox, and handling device-specific layouts.
