title: Management Assistant / Future Operations Lead
description:
Mango E-Commerce is a fast-growing Dutch firm specializing in electronics and home goods. We aren’t just looking for a virtual assistant; we are looking for an intelligent, ambitious partner to grow into a leadership role within our operations.



What's in it for you?



•?  ?A Career Path: Scale your responsibilities and pay as the company grows.

•?  ?Skill Building: Master high-value, transferable skills through hands-on experience.

•?  ?Global Flexibility: Work from anywhere in the world in a fully remote setup.



Your Core Responsibilities:



•?  ?Inventory & Data: Meticulously update inventory data within our Excel/Google Sheets models and provide actionable management advice based on the numbers.

•?  ?Customer Excellence: Act as the "smile of our business," providing high-quality support using AI-assisted tools.

•?  ?Operational Growth: As trust is established, you will transition into Procurement, placing inventory orders and making higher-stakes operational decisions.



What do you bring to the table?



•?  ?Intellectual Curiosity: A sharp, analytical mind that loves to solve problems.

•?  ?Communication: Fluency in English. You must be adept at using AI tools to translate and polish communications into professional Dutch.

•?  ?Tech Savvy: Foundational skills in Google Sheets/Excel.

•?  ?Academic Excellence: Minimum high-school completion with a track record of above-average performance.

•?  ?Attitude: A proactive "Can-do" spirit and the drive to reach new echelons of performance.



The Logistics

•?  ?Schedule: Starting at 24 hours per week, with the potential to scale to 40 hours as your role expands.

•?  ?Availability: Flexible remote work, including approximately 1 hour of task management over the weekend.

•?  ?Compensation: €250 – €400 per month (starting, based on 24 hours/week). Pay increases in direct proportion to the quality of your work and expanded hours.



How to Apply

We value clarity and intelligence. To be considered:

1.? ??
 us your CV.

2.? ?Include a one-paragraph motivation explaining why you are the right fit for a fast-growing e-commerce firm.

3.? ?Shortlisted candidates will be invited to take a short intelligence and logic assessment.

title: Senior Web Developer / Technical Lead
description:
About Truffle Digital



Truffle Digital manages and maintains a large portfolio of client websites (150+), primarily built on WordPress. Our focus is long-term client relationships, stability, and quality - not one-off builds.



We’re rebuilding our delivery team and are looking for a Senior Web Developer / Technical Lead to take ownership of technical quality and standards across our entire website portfolio.



This role removes technical QA and decision-making from the CEO and becomes the technical authority within the business.



The role:

As Senior Web Developer / Technical Lead, you will be responsible for ensuring that all development work across Truffle Digital’s client websites is built correctly, securely, and consistently.



This is not a project management role and not a junior position. You will be trusted to make technical decisions, review work, and raise issues early.



Our environment is WordPress-based, with Elementor used across most client sites. The role requires someone who can work comfortably within an Elementor ecosystem while maintaining high standards for performance, structure, and maintainability.



Key responsibilities:

Technical leadership & standards 

Own technical standards across all client websites

Define best practices for WordPress, Elementor usage, plugins, performance, and security

Ensure consistency across a large multi-site portfolio

Identify and manage technical debt



Quality assurance

Perform technical QA on all development work before release

Ensure changes do not introduce regressions or performance issues

Approve work as production-ready



Task review & technical guidance

Review tasks prepared by the Technical Project Manager before work begins

Clarify technical approach, scope, and risks

Provide estimates or guidance where required



Team support

Support and guide developers (current and future)

Review code and implementations when needed

Set clear expectations for what “done” means



Technical environment

WordPress (core platform)

Elementor (primary page builder across most sites)

Mix of custom themes, plugins, and third-party tools

High-volume agency environment with many live sites



You must be comfortable:

Working within existing Elementor builds

Improving structure and performance of Elementor-based sites

Making pragmatic decisions based on real-world constraints

Balancing quality with speed and maintainability



Required experience:

5+ years professional web development experience

Strong WordPress experience in production environments

Hands-on experience working with Elementor at scale

Experience working in an agency or managing multiple websites

Strong understanding of performance optimisation, security, and stability

Comfortable reviewing others’ work and giving direct feedback



Nice to have:

Experience mentoring junior developers

Familiarity with Git and staging environments

Performance auditing (Core Web Vitals, Lighthouse)

Experience managing or standardising large site portfolios



What this role is not:

Not a page builder role

Not a project manager role

Not client support

Not a junior position

This role owns technical authority, quality, and standards.



What success looks like:

Clear technical standards across all sites

Fewer bugs, rollbacks, and emergency fixes

Developers know exactly what is expected before starting work

CEO is no longer involved in technical QA or implementation decisions



Why join Truffle Digital

Long-term, stable role (not project-to-project)

High trust and autonomy

Opportunity to shape standards and systems

Remote-friendly environment

Work that values quality over chaos

title: SEO & WordPress VA — Image Optimization + Blog Design + Automation
description:
About the Role:

We manage an advanced automated blog system that uses AI, WordPress, and Make (Integromat) to publish SEO articles.

We’re looking for a smart, detail-oriented VA who understands both SEO strategy and automation workflows to help us improve content generation, keyword targeting, and on-page optimization.



This is not a basic SEO posting job — you’ll be part of a modern AI-powered content system.



Your Mission:

You’ll help us grow the site’s traffic by improving how articles are generated, optimized, and interlinked.

You’ll combine keyword research, on-page SEO, and automation awareness to make sure each article ranks fast and looks great.



Main Tasks:

???? Automation & Setup



Understand the existing automation (Make ? WordPress ? Ideogram ? Airtable)



Help prepare new topics and keywords for automated article generation



Verify that articles are correctly generated and formatted



???? SEO Optimization



Perform keyword research for new article topics (using Ubersuggest / Ahrefs / Google Keyword Planner)



Optimize titles, meta descriptions, slugs, headings, and alt tags



Ensure internal linking between articles and relevant pages



Track SEO performance (Google Search Console, Analytics)



????? Visual Optimization



Improve or replace blog images (Canva / Ideogram)



Rename and tag all images with SEO keywords



Maintain brand style and responsive layout (Kadence)



Requirements:

? Experience with WordPress (Kadence, Elementor, or Gutenberg)

? Understanding of SEO (keywords, on-page optimization, linking)

? Comfortable using Make / Zapier / Airtable or willing to learn fast

? Strong attention to detail

? Intermediate to advanced English



Nice to Have:



Experience with AI content tools (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, etc.)



Understanding of prompt writing for image generation



Familiarity with Google Search Console and schema markup



Working Hours:

Flexible — 15–25 hours/week.

You can organize your schedule as long as results are delivered on time.



Salary:

???? $5–7/hour (depending on experience).

Possibility of a long-term role with performance bonuses after the first month.



How to Apply:

Please send:

1?? A short Loom video (1–2 min) explaining your experience with SEO or automation tools.

2?? 2–3 examples of WordPress sites or SEO projects you’ve worked on.

3?? A short explanation (text) of how you would research keywords for a new niche.



???? We’re looking for someone proactive, structured, and curious about automation.

If you love mixing SEO, systems, and creative problem solving — apply now and join the team!

title: Credit Repair Specialist Needed (Experienced Only)
description:
We are seeking an experienced Credit Repair Specialist with a minimum of 4+ years of proven, hands-on experience in the credit repair industry.



The ideal candidate must have credit repair down to a science and fully understand the dispute process from start to finish, including removing negative items accurately and compliantly.



Requirements:

 • Minimum 4 years verifiable credit repair experience (required)

 • Must understand FCRA, Metro 2, CFPB, identity theft, and data breach dispute methods

 • Must know how to remove collections on the first round when applicable and compliant

 • Strong experience removing:

 • Collections

 • Charge offs

 • Late payments

 • Repossessions

 • Bankruptcies

 • Student loans

 • Inquiries

 • Must know how to use DisputeFox software efficiently

 • Must have proof of results and prior work

 • Deep understanding of dispute strategies and compliance

 • Strong attention to detail and accuracy

 • Reliable internet and communication

 • Must be responsive and available daily

 • Ready to start immediately



How to Apply:



Serious and experienced applicants only.



Please send:

 • Resume or summary of experience

 • Proof of past results/work

 • Your WhatsApp number for direct communication



Only candidates with real experience and proven results will be considered.

title: Online Demo Lesson Tutor (Work From Home!)
description:
Brighterly is a fast-growing EdTech startup that helps children in the USA (K–8) succeed in Math and English Language Arts (ELA) through fun and effective online tutoring. Our mission is simple: make learning enjoyable and impactful, preparing kids for a bright tomorrow.



And we’re looking for someone who will be the very first to inspire and engage students on their learning journey!



Apply via this link - only applicants who apply via the link will be considered:


/o/online-demo-lesson-tutor?source=OnlineJobs



As a Demo Lesson Teacher, You Will:

- Deliver engaging 1-on-1 Math & ELA classes using our ready-made materials.

- Showcase Brighterly’s unique approach to parents and students, creating a positive first impression.

- Provide detailed reports on your students’ progress.

- Track performance and share insights to improve the learning experience.



What We Offer:

- Flexible online work — teach from anywhere.

- Ready-made lesson scripts & materials — no extra prep.

- Training & ongoing support from Brighterly mentors.

- Fun, supportive team and professional growth opportunities.

- A chance to impact children’s learning journey from the very first lesson.



What We're Looking For:

- Advanced English (C1+) with little/no accent.

- At least 6 months of experience teaching children.

- High school-level math proficiency (or higher) with a diploma.

- Strong communication & engagement skills.

- Ability to work 20 hours/week during peak hours (weekdays prioritized).

- Reliable computer, webcam, microphone, and internet connection.

- Patience, professionalism, and passion for working with kids.



If you’re passionate about making learning exciting and empowering for children, we’d love to have you on board!

title: Strategic Account Manager & Business Developer
description:
Summary

Location: Remote (Philippines Only)

Schedule: Strict 2:00 PM – 9:00 PM PH Standard Time



Do not apply if:

- You are looking for a "side gig" or "passive income." We need a dedicated professional.

- You are a "Task Taker" who waits for instructions.

- You do not have experience auditing businesses or creating technical Process Maps (Miro).



About The Role

We are Flow IO, a high-precision Technical Agency. We build digital infrastructure (Workflow Architecture + Automation) for SMBs.

We are looking for a Business Developer & Account Manager to own the "Strategy Layer" of our accounts. You will act as the internal "Workflow Architect" for our clients. While our developers write the code, you define WHAT needs to be built to solve the client's business problems .

This is a high-autonomy role where you will manage Client Retainers, design Operational Blueprints, and drive revenue through strategic upselling .



Core Responsibilities

- Strategic Architecture (Miro): Conduct deep-dive discovery calls to find operational "cracks" in a client’s business.

- Translate these pains into visual Workflow Diagrams and Business Development Plans .

- Client Relationship Management: Act as the single point of contact for non-technical inquiries. Ensure clients utilize their Retainer hours effectively so they renew month-over-month .

- Commercial Growth (Upselling): Identify new opportunities within an account. Convert "Feature Requests" into paid Change Orders or New Sprints .

- Scope Governance: Act as the "Firewall" against Scope Creep. Validate technical feasibility with the Senior Developer before promising anything to a client .



The Requirements (Non-Negotiables)

- Experience: 3+ Years in Account Management, Business Analysis, or Digital Strategy within an Agency.

- Tech Stack: Mastery of ClickUp (Project Mgmt), Miro (Process Mapping), and Loom (Async Updates) .

- Operational Mindset: Preferred: Six Sigma (Yellow/Green Belt) or proven experience with Process Auditing and DMAIC frameworks.

- Availability: You must be strictly available during 2 PM - 9 PM Philippine Time to overlap with client needs. "Ghosting" or missing meetings is an immediate termination offense .



The Offer

- Model: Long-term Contract

- Culture: We operate on a "No Evidence, No Done" policy. High standards, high precision, zero micromanagement for those who deliver.

title: Meta ads editor (instagram, tiktok, facebook)
description: We are testing multiple editors for the new brand we are launching in male shapewear tanktops. We are looking for someone with experience and a proven track record of editing / creating successful meta ads content with UGC content, VSL's, normal videos etc. We also need the editor the find videos from TikTok, edit them with the desired angles and consistently iterate on the winner ads. This will all be communicated to you what the demands are and what to focus on.

title: Executive Virtual Assistant
description:
We’re looking for a reliable, proactive, and organized Executive Virtual Assistant who can support internal operations, handle recurring admin work, and help build systems as the business grows. The role starts part-time with potential to grow into a full-time opportunity.



This is a non-client-facing role for now, focused purely on internal execution, support, and operational follow-through.



Daytime PH hours, with some evening overlap for U.S. meetings



Job duties and responsibilities:

       1. Administrative & Operations Support

                 - Organize and manage digital files, documentation, and tools

                 - Perform data entry and track recurring operational tasks

                 - Assist with light bookkeeping (e.g., expense categorization, rent reminders)

                 - Order office/clinic supplies as needed



        2. Client Follow-Up & Paperwork

                  - Follow up on unsigned digital waivers and incomplete forms

                  - Ensure all required documentation is submitted and stored

                  - Maintain internal client records (no direct phone communication at this stage)



         3. SOP Creation & Process Documentation

                  - Watch recorded walkthroughs and write clear SOPs

                  - Help create an internal SOP library for reference and training

                  - Suggest process improvements and help standardize systems



          4. Organization & Executive Support

                   - Assist with cross-platform organization 
, tools, cloud storage)

                   - Complete executive and personal support tasks (calendar, errands, reminders)

                   - Conduct simple research tasks (e.g., phone line options, software tools)



           5. Ad Hoc Support

                   - Make simple edits in Canva (e.g., business cards, flyers)

                   - Update business info across websites and platforms

                   - Support ongoing operational projects and to-do list items



Qualifications

                   - Communication: Excellent written English; responsive and professional

                   - Organization: Strong attention to detail; systems-focused

                   - Initiative: Comfortable taking ownership and figuring things out independently

                   - Tech-Savvy: Familiar with tools like Google Workspace, Trello, Slack/WhatsApp, Zoom

                   - Adaptable: Willing to learn and take on new responsibilities as the business grows

                   - Reliable: Trustworthy with sensitive information and consistent in follow-through

                   - Availability: Must be available for morning PH hours with some overlap in U.S. evenings (~6–9 PM ET / 7–10 AM PH)



If you believe you're a strong fit for this position, please respond with the following:



       1. A link to your resume in PDF format. 

                       Your resume should include your contact details, a recent professional photo, and a summary of your work 

                       experience, emphasizing tasks relevant to this role.



         2. A screenshot of your PC specifications and internet speed, 



          3. A one-minute Vocaroo recording of your self-introduction



          4. Your WhatsApp number for easy communication. 



To ensure you've read this message carefully, please include the word "Availability" in the subject line of your
.



We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Influencer Partnership Manager
description:
We’re looking for a Influencer Partnership Manager who will manage influencer ecosystems, coordinate high-leverage collaborations, and structure partnerships that drive audience growth, trust, and long-term value. This role is ideal for someone who understands how influence, alignment, and timing work together and knows how to turn one conversation into a network-wide outcome.



Why You’ll Want to Join

- You will be paid in USD (bi-monthly: every 15th and 30th)

- Up to 14 days of Paid Time Off annually (starting Day 1)

- Observance of Holidays per company guidelines

- 100% remote setup so you can work wherever you’re most productive

- Direct access to a founder with a strong personal brand and growing ecosystem

- High ownership role with influence across partnerships, community, and growth



What You’ll Work On



Influencer and Ecosystem Management

- Manage relationships with a curated group of aligned influencers across health, tech, urbanism, and culture

- Coordinate collaborative posts, shared content, and audience cross-pollination

- Act as the primary point of contact for influencer teams and managers

- Ensure collaborations feel thoughtful, aligned, and mutually valuable



Podcast and Media Activation Support

- Coordinate with media and PR stakeholders to maximize each appearance

- Ensure every podcast or media 
nt includes a clear content or audience exchange

- Structure content trades that extend reach beyond the original appearance



Brand and Affiliate Partnerships

- Identify and secure partnerships with regenerative and mission-aligned brands

- Structure affiliate, sponsorship, or co-branded initiatives that drive real value

- Manage partnership logistics, timelines, and deliverables end to end



High-Level Collaboration and Liaison Work

- Serve as a trusted liaison between senior leaders and key partners

- Coordinate joint events such as live conversations, webinars, or summits

- Help design and execute multi-party content initiatives with high visibility



Campaign Planning and Execution

- Plan and run multi-channel partnership campaigns tied to launches or initiatives

- Track outcomes and ensure follow-through across all collaborators

- Continuously refine partnership playbooks and workflows



What You Bring

- 5+ years of experience in partnerships, community, business development, or strategic operations

- Proven ability to manage high-touch relationships across diverse stakeholder groups

- Strong negotiation skills with a focus on long-term alignment over short-term wins

- High emotional intelligence and comfort navigating different communication styles

- Experience running coordinated campaigns across multiple channels

- Clear written and verbal communication skills



Nice to Have

- Experience working with thought leaders, creators, or founder-led brands

- Background in wellness, sustainability, urbanism, or impact-driven spaces

- Familiarity with affiliate programs, content partnerships, or audience swaps

- Experience acting as a right hand or chief-of-staff style operator



How to Apply

Please include:

1. Your updated resume

2. A short 1 to 2 minute Loom video explaining how you approach partnerships and relationship-driven growth



Only candidates who submit a Loom video will be considered.





If you understand that the right relationships can accelerate everything, enjoy building trust at scale, and know how to turn collaboration into 
ntum, this role offers real ownership and the chance to shape an ecosystem rather than just manage deals.

title: Executive Virtual Assistant (Recruiting & Operations)
description:
We’re looking for an Executive Virtual Assistant (Recruiting & Operations) to support scheduling, recruiting, and day-to-day coordination across the company. You’ll help keep hiring and internal operations running smoothly by managing calendars, organizing candidate pipelines, and maintaining systems with accuracy and care.



This role is ideal for someone highly organized, proactive, and comfortable learning new tools quickly. If you enjoy problem-solving and creating order in fast-paced environments, you’ll thrive here.



Why You’ll Want to Join

- You will be paid in USD (bi-monthly: every 15th and 30th)

- Up to 14 days of Paid Time Off annually (starting Day 1)

- Observance of Holidays per company guidelines

- 100% remote setup so you can work wherever you feel most productive

- Work directly with leadership in a fast-moving health-tech startup

- Opportunity to build skills in operations, recruiting, and process management



What You’ll Work On



Scheduling & Coordination

- Manage calendars, schedule interviews, and coordinate meetings with internal and external stakeholders

- Handle time zone coordination and ensure smooth communication between teams

- Prepare agendas, take structured meeting notes, and follow up on next steps



Recruiting Operations

- Support the recruiting process by scheduling interviews, maintaining candidate records, and tracking progress in the ATS (Ashby or similar tools)

- Keep recruiting pipelines and applicant data accurate and up to date

- Communicate with candidates and hiring managers to ensure an efficient and positive experience

- Assist with posting jobs, organizing resumes, and monitoring candidate sources



Operations & Administrative Support

- Maintain internal documents, trackers, and reports across teams

- Help refine systems and processes to improve efficiency

- Learn and adapt quickly to new tools used across the company

- Anticipate operational needs and proactively address potential issues



What You Bring

- 3+ years of experience in administrative, recruiting, or operations support

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Proactive and resourceful with a problem-solving mindset

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills

- Experience using tools like Google Workspace, Slack, Notion, and an ATS (Ashby, Lever, Greenhouse, or similar)

- Able to work independently while maintaining strong follow-through on tasks and priorities



Nice to Have

- Experience supporting executives or founders in a startup or fast-growing team

- Familiarity with health-tech or SaaS environments

- Ability to create or improve workflows and documentation

- Interest in recruiting operations, people ops, or startup systems



How to Apply



Please include:

1. Your updated resume

2. A short 1–2 minute Loom video introducing yourself and describing how you stay organized and manage competing priorities



Only complete applications that include both a resume and Loom video will be reviewed.





If you’re detail-oriented, adaptable, and motivated by helping teams stay organized and efficient, this is an opportunity to work closely with leadership in a company redefining how home-health operations run.

title: Video Editor (Political Campaign)
description:
We’re looking for a Video Editor who can turn long-form interviews, speeches, and complex policy discussions into clear, compelling short-form video content for modern political audiences. This role is video-first and editing-led, with social distribution as a secondary responsibility.



You will focus primarily on clipping interviews, producing short-form explainers, and shaping video narratives that make nuanced political topics accessible without oversimplifying them. This role is ideal for an editor who understands pacing, captions, visual hierarchy, and how political content performs on platforms like YouTube Shorts and Instagram Reels.



A strong understanding of US politics is required, and prior experience working on a political campaign, advocacy organization, or political media project is highly preferred.



Perks & Benefits

- Paid in USD every 15th & 30th of the month

- Up to 14 days of Paid Time Off annually, from Day 1

- Observance of Philippine Regular Holidays (paid)

- 100% remote – work from anywhere

- Collaborate on meaningful, high-impact international content

- Be part of a fast-moving creative team where your ideas matter



What You’ll Be Doing



Short-Form Video Editing and Clipping

- Edit and clip 10 to 15 interviews per week from podcasts, news appearances, and recorded conversations

- Produce short-form videos optimized for YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, and similar platforms

- Identify strong hooks, soundbites, and 
nts that translate well into short-form political content

- Add captions, visual emphasis, light motion elements, and pacing adjustments to improve clarity and retention



Policy and Message Explainability



- Create short-form videos that explain complex bills, policy positions, or speeches in a clear, accessible way

- Edit selfie-style videos, speech clips, and in-person recordings into concise narrative formats

- Maintain accuracy and context while making content engaging and easy to follow



Content Publishing and Platform Support



- Prepare videos for publishing across YouTube and social platforms

- Support basic social media posting workflows when needed

- Ensure consistent formatting, titling, and visual standards across channels



Creative Collaboration



- Work closely with campaign leadership and communications stakeholders

- Translate loose guidance or raw footage into polished, publish-ready videos

- Iterate quickly based on feedback, timing needs, and campaign priorities



Who You Are

- 2 to 5+ years of experience as a video editor, ideally in political, media, news, or advocacy environments

- Strong proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite including Premiere Pro, Photoshop, and Illustrator

- Ability to work beyond Canva or CapCut and handle professional-level editing workflows

- Solid understanding of short-form video formats and platform-specific best practices

- Clear understanding of US politics, current events, and campaign communication dynamics

- Ability to balance speed, accuracy, and editorial judgment in a fast-paced environment

- Strong organizational skills and comfort managing multiple video outputs per week



How to Apply

Please submit:

- Your updated resume

- A portfolio link

- Link to your best long-form / youtube video

- A 1–2 minute Loom video introducing yourself and briefly explaining your background and work experience (only applicants with a Loom video will be prioritized)

title: Experienced Booker / Sales Representative (Remote)
description:
We’re looking for an experienced booker or salesperson who is confident, organised, and comfortable having real conversations (not someone who relies heavily on scripts).



ABOUT US:



We are a mobile massage therapy business, providing professional massage services directly to clients in their homes, workplaces, and events. We focus on quality, trust, and genuine human connection, and we’re growing - which is why we’re looking for someone who can confidently represent our brand on the phone.



WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR:



Proven experience in sales or booking roles

High level of English (spoken and written)

Strong communication skills and confidence on calls

Organised, reliable, and able to manage follow-ups

Able to ad-lib naturally and sound human (not robotic or overly scripted)



ROLE DETAILS:



Expected calls: 50 calls per week

Working hours: 40 hours per month (approx. 8–10 hours per week)

Start date: Week commencing 23rd February



Contract: 3-month trial period

Opportunity to increase working hours based on performance



SALARY:

£200 per month

Payable via Wise



APPLICATION REQUIREMENT:



Please
 your application to (infonorthlondonmassagetherapy at gmail dot com)

with “Application – Experienced Booker / Sales Representative” as your subject line.



In your
, include:



Your updated CV / resume

A 60-second voice note as if you were calling a company to introduce our corporate massage and wellbeing service.

The voice recording must be submitted via Vocaroo.



This helps us assess your communication style, confidence, and ability to think on the spot.



If you’re confident on the phone, enjoy sales conversations, and want a flexible remote role with a growing wellness business, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Social Media Marketing / Virtual Assistant
description:
We are an internationally operating company that combines innovation and creativity with a strong focus on customer satisfaction. These are the foundations of our success. To strengthen our digital team, we are currently looking for:



Social Media Marketing Manager / Virtual Assistant (VA) for TikTok Accounts (Part-Time)



Your Responsibilities:

- Daily posting of content on multiple TikTok accounts



- Performing human-like activity on these accounts (likes, comments, interaction)



- Maintaining and managing the accounts to ensure a professional appearance



- Creating and delivering regular reports to management



- Working closely with our marketing and digital team





Your Profile:

- Most important requirement: You own at least one fully functional Android smartphone (Android 10 or higher) that you can use exclusively for this job -> NO PRIVATE PHONES(!)



- You have good English skills (spoken and written)



- You bring several months of experience in social media (ideally TikTok)



- You are reliable, structured, and enjoy working on creative tasks



- You are flexible, solution-oriented, and always find new ways if something doesn’t work out immediately





What We Offer:

You can expect a future-oriented career with competitive pay and a highly motivated digital team. There are no limits to your creativity and independence. If you’ve read this far, please send us a message with the word “Phone” and explain why you are the right fit for this job.



We are very much looking forward to hearing from you!

title: VA for Lead Sourcing Role at Established Marketing Agency
description:
Hi guys!



I’m Alvie, and I run a social media management agency that’s been growing steadily for nearly five years.



Over the past 6–12 months, we’ve focused on refining our service and delivering strong results for our existing clients (currently around 30–35). Now, we’re ready to grow and bring on new clients through outbound outreach on Instagram and potentially LinkedIn.



To support this, we’re looking for a Virtual Assistant to help manage the initial outreach process - identifying potential clients and sending first messages using scripts we provide.



We've been doing this for 4-5 years, so this is a really long term, stable role with a long term vision in a great team.



What You’ll Be Doing



• Find and qualify potential clients on Instagram and LinkedIn

• Send initial outreach messages using our proven scripts

• Keep outreach activity organized and up to date in tracking sheets



(This role focuses only on prospecting and first messages - you won't need to reply to leads, have sales conversations, etc!)



What You’ll Get



• A long-term role with 12 hours per week

• Clear systems, scripts, and processes to follow

• A friendly, supportive team that values reliability and good communication

• Opportunities for bonuses and growth based on performance

• A culture built on respect, kindness, and appreciation



What We’re Looking For



• Strong English communication skills

• High attention to detail and consistency

• Comfortable working with simple systems, scripts, and tracking sheets

• Dependable, proactive, and excited to contribute to a growing agency



If you’re organized, consistent, and enjoy structured outreach work, we’d love to hear from you.



Thanks a mil! 

Alvie

description:
Online Advertising, Video Editing & Digital Admin Support



Full-Time | Remote (Philippines)



Working Hours:

Monday to Friday, 9:00am–5:00pm Philippines time

(Availability during these hours is required)



?



About the Role



We are seeking a reliable, detail-oriented full-time remote tea
mber to support online advertising uploads, basic video editing, and digital administrative tasks. This role requires excellent spoken and written English, strong attention to detail, and the ability to follow documented processes accurately while remaining consistently online during working hours.



?



Key Responsibilities

 • Uploading and managing online advertisements across digital platforms

 • Editing short-form video content for ads and online use

 • Following step-by-step SOPs and checklists accurately

 • Communicating clearly and professionally in spoken and written English

 • Identifying and flagging issues or errors early

?



About You

 • Excellent spoken and written English (essential)

?

?

title: Full-stack Developer *Superstar Only*
description:
Are you a systems-minded full-stack developer who thrives on clean code and seamless integrations?

  

Can you build high-performance web experiences, automate workflows, and connect tools like Stripe, Twilio, and AWS with confidence and speed?

  

Do you take ownership of projects, think in APIs, and love turning scattered tools into elegant systems that just work?

  

We’re looking for a Full-Stack Developer to join our remote team and help us build and scale the backend infrastructure that powers our digital product launches, sales funnels, messaging automation, and more.



This is a hands-on role that requires attention to detail, strong technical autonomy, and a builder’s mindset. You’ll be working at the core of our operations, developing the tech foundation that supports twice-per month product launches - a fast-paced, high-impact cycle critical to our business.



If you thrive on shipping solid, scalable code and enjoy solving real-world problems with clean, connected systems - we’d love to hear from you.



ABOUT US



We are a fast-growing holistic beauty company seeking the brightest, most talented minds to join our remote team. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll be working closely with one of the leading holistic beauty creators, with a global community of over 2.5 million followers and a reputation for innovation, impact, and integrity.



We move quickly, work collaboratively, and build things that scale.



THE ROLE: FULL-STACK DEVELOPER (API-Driven, MarTech Stack)



You’ll be responsible for:

• Developing high-performance landing pages and micro-sites for product launches

• Creating and maintaining REST APIs and webhooks to connect tools like Stripe, Twilio, and CRMs

• Deploying serverless functions to automate messaging, billing, and customer data flows

• Managing infrastructure on AWS (S3, CloudFront, Lambda)

• Owning the technical execution of backend processes that support twice-per-month launches



REQUIREMENTS



Core Technical Skills

• JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3

• React (or comparable component-based framework)

• Node.js + Express (or Python with FastAPI)

• TypeScript (preferred)

• Twilio API (SMS, WhatsApp)

• AWS (S3, Lambda, CloudFront, IAM, Route 53)

• REST API design & integration

• Git, CI/CD workflows, environment management



Data Handling

• Basic SQL or NoSQL

• Form data processing

• CRM API integration



You’re a fit if you…

• Write clean, maintainable, modular code

• Can work independently and ship with confidence

• Think in systems and thrive on API integration

• Have strong attention to detail and follow-through

• Enjoy solving problems with clear logic and clean architecture



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

• Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

• Stable high-speed internet connection

• Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

• Full-time opportunity

• Remote work setup (Philippines-based applicants only)



Benefits

• Competitive pay

• Training and growth opportunities

• Opportunity to work with a fast-growing content-driven company



BONUS SKILLS

Stripe Billing (subscriptions, invoices, advanced webhook automation)

• Experience with Shopify or e-commerce integrations

• Familiarity with Manychat JSON API

• Kajabi API/webhooks



Application Instructions

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here is what to do next:



Please go to the link below, review the questions carefully, and share the required information.

 


 

If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Automation Specialist & Systems Thinker (SQL + Vector DBs)
description:
I run a small IT consulting + venture studio based in Dubai. I'm looking for a technical specialist to join my team: not just to execute tasks, but to help me engineer the "brain" of the business. 



The role: I am looking for a systems thinker who can connect different apps and data sources to build seamless workflows. I don't care which specific tools you use (Make, n8n, Zapier, or custom scripts), I care that you understand the logic behind the automation. Furthermore, you will be assisting with data management for AI-driven projects, which is where your database knowledge comes in. As I work with those systems on a daily basis myself, we'll be working closely together. 



What you bring:

- A "Systems Thinking" Mindset: You look at the big picture of how data flows between applications, not just single tasks.

- Tool-Agnostic Automation Experience: You are comfortable picking up new tools quickly to build efficient workflows.

- SQL Knowledge: You can write queries and understand relational database structures.

- Vector Database Familiarity: You understand what vector embeddings are (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, or pgvector) and how they relate to AI/LLMs.

- Decent English skills and the ability to explain complex technical logic simply.

- Even though I want to start on a freelance-basis, I'm hoping to grow this role into a full-time position over the next 3-6 months. This depends heavily on your ability to not only support on internal systems, but also deliver on client projects. 

- Please submit your application with 6 apply points and start the subject line with "SYS01".



I look forward to your application!



Luc

title: Content Creator - Reels Format
description:
Create 2 story telling - documentary style videos in 9:16 (reels) per day.



Each video will be roughly 1 minute long.



All video's, images, music and sound effects have to be generated from royalty-free sources. This can be self generated with AI, or from royalty-free sources.



More information will be given during further rounds hiring process.



If you want to apply for the job, you will be required to make 1 video to display your skills. 



You will be given an example video, and a script. Based on the script you get, it is your task to make a video.



The person that can make the best video will be hired.



Wage is $150 USD per month, + $10 USD bonus for each video that reaches 1m+ views on Instagram.



If you would like to make a video to display your skills, please message me saying 'I would like to display my skills by making a trial video'



DO NOT send me your resume, do not message a long message on why you are a good candidate. I simply want to receive the sentence, 'I would like to display my skills by making a trial video'.



This shows that you have read the job description.



All wages will be paid monthly via Wise, bank details or G cash.

title: Executive Assistant (2 VAs needed)
description:
We are seeking a proactive and highly organized Executive Assistant to provide comprehensive support to our leadership team. This is a full-time remote role, requiring 40 hours per week during UK business hours. The ideal candidate will be fluent in English, detail-oriented, and capable of managing multiple priorities with professionalism and efficiency.



Key Responsibilities:

- Manage calendars, appointments, and scheduling across multiple time zones

- Oversee
 inboxes, draft professional correspondence, and flag urgent matters

- Delegate tasks on behalf of executives and follow up to ensure completion

- Identify and address inconsistencies or issues in documents and communications

- Maintain an organized flow of information and ensure nothing falls through the cracks



Qualifications:

- Excellent spoken and written English communication skills

- Proven experience managing calendars and
 correspondence for executives

- Strong multitasking and prioritization skills in a fast-paced environment

- Keen eye for detail and ability to catch inconsistencies or errors

- Comfortable working independently and exercising good judgment

- Experience working within UK business hours or similar time zones preferred

title: Bilingual Lead Manager (Spanish/English)
description:
We’re looking for a bilingual (English/Spanish) communicator who enjoys helping homeowners, asks great questions, and thrives in a structured, fast-paced remote environment.



Location

Remote/Virtual



Schedule

Part-time: 20 hours per week

Hours: Monday–Friday, approximately 3:00 PM – 7:00 PM (CST)

Afternoon shift required



Compensation

$250–$400 per month, depending on experience



Role Overview

PPS House Buyers is seeking a bilingual (Spanish/English) lead manager to handle inbound and follow-up communication with warm real estate leads. This role is focused on gathering detailed seller and property information, managing follow-ups, and preparing qualified leads for the acquisition manager.



This is not cold calling. All leads have already expressed interest at some point.



Key Responsibilities

- Answer inbound calls from warm leads (approximately 25–30 calls per day)

- Conduct 5–7 minute discovery calls using a provided script

- Gather detailed information about:

- Property details

- Seller motivation and situation

- Timeline and expectations

- Enter accurate, detailed notes into the company CRM (ARI Simply)

- Follow up with existing leads in the “warm pipeline” via phone calls, text messages, and
s.

- Re-engage older leads (6 months to 2+ years old) to determine renewed interest

- Return missed calls promptly and professionally

- Communicate clearly with the Acquisition Manager to warm up qualified opportunities



Required Qualifications

- Fluent in both Spanish and English (spoken and written)

- Strong phone presence and communication skills

- Prior experience in:

* Real estate (preferred), OR

* Customer service, call handling, or lead management

- Comfortable following scripts and asking structured questions

- Ability to multitask between calls, texts,
s, and CRM updates

- Reliable, responsive, and punctual during scheduled work hours



Preferred Experience

- Real estate lead management or acquisitions support

- CRM experience (ARI Simply a plus, but not required)

- Experience handling warm or inbound leads

- Strong attention to detail and note-taking skills



Training & Support

- Script and process training will be provided

- Ongoing support to ensure quality, responsiveness, and consistency

- Opportunity to grow into additional responsibilities over time



What Success Looks Like

- Timely responses to leads during scheduled hours

- High-quality notes that allow the Acquisition Manager to quickly assess deal potential

- Professional, empathetic communication with sellers

- Consistent follow-up and strong lead engagement



How to Apply

Kindly fill out this form:







NOTE: Make sure to select “JEN” as a recruiter.



Further details will be shared after initial screening.

title: Healthcare Insurance Credentialing & Billing Specialist
description:
We are seeking a highly detail-oriented Healthcare Insurance Credentialing & Billing Specialist to own and optimize our credentialing and revenue cycle workflows. This role is responsible for setting up provider credentialing and payer enrollment with insurance companies, ensuring accurate coding, compliant billing, timely claim submission, effective denial/appeals management, and a clear, professional patient billing experience.



Credentialing & Payer Enrollment (Required)



---Lead end-to-end insurance credentialing and enrollment for providers and the practice/facility with Medicare, Medicaid, and commercial payers



---Prepare, submit, and track credentialing applications, supporting documentation, and attestations (including CAQH profile setup/maintenance as applicable)



---Manage re-credentialing cycles, payer updates, roster changes, and provider demographic/taxonomy updates (NPI, taxonomy codes, licensure, malpractice, etc.)



---Follow up proactively with payers to resolve issues and reduce time-to-network participation



Medical Billing & Coding



---Assign and validate accurate ICD-10 and CPT coding based on documentation and payer rules



---Manage end-to-end billing workflow: charge entry, claim creation, claim submission, posting, and reconciliation



---Handle claim rejections/denials, research root causes, and submit appeals with supporting documentation



---Maintain accurate patient statements, balances, and payment plans as needed



---Insurance Verification & Claims Management



---Perform insurance verification, benefits checks, eligibility validation, and prior authorization support as needed



---Maintain working knowledge of Medicare, Medicaid, and commercial payer requirements and updates



---Communicate with payers to resolve claim issues and improve first-pass claim acceptance



Compliance & Documentation



---Ensure strict adherence to HIPAA and internal privacy/security standards



---Maintain clean, audit-ready credentialing and billing records and documentation standards



EHR / Practice Management Systems



---Work within EHR and billing/practice management software to ensure accurate data entry, claim workflows, and reporting



---Identify workflow improvements to reduce denials and accelerate reimbursement



Required Qualifications



---Proven experience setting up and managing insurance credentialing/payer enrollment from start to finish



---Strong experience in medical billing/coding and insurance processes (verification, submission, denials/appeals, patient billing)



---Working knowledge of ICD-10 and CPT coding



---Demonstrated understanding of HIPAA compliance and privacy/security best practices



---Proficiency with EHR and billing/practice management platforms



---Familiarity with Medicare, Medicaid, and commercial insurance regulations and documentation requirements



---Strong attention to detail, organization, and ability to manage multiple priorities



Preferred Qualifications



---Certification (preferred): CPC, CCS, CPB or similar



---Experience with CAQH, PECOS (Medicare), state Medicaid portals, and payer-specific enrollment systems

title: Graphic Designer (Meta Ads) | Onuia (DTC E-commerce)
description:
Onuia is a fast-growing DTC e-commerce brand and we’re looking for a performance-focused Graphic Designer for Meta Ads. The goal is simple: create high-converting static and motion-light creatives, test multiple variations, and improve based on data.



Responsibilities:



- Design Meta ad creatives (static and simple animated formats)

- Turn concepts and raw inputs into multiple variations (hooks, headlines, CTAs)

- Create clear, conversion-focused layouts for cold and retargeting audiences

- Design and iterate in Figma with strong visual hierarchy and brand consistency

- Improve creatives using Meta performance metrics (thumbstop, CTR, CPA)



Requirements:



- Proven experience designing for DTC brands (portfolio required)

- Strong understanding of performance marketing and ad-first design

- Highly skilled in Figma (components, variants, fast iteration)

- Ability to design multiple variations quickly from one core concept

- Comfortable reading ad data and iterating based on results



To apply, send:



- 3–5 Meta ad design examples

- Tools used + availability

- Rate (per design or weekly package)

title: Logistics Dispatcher
description:
Role Overview: 

We are seeking an experienced Logistics Dispatcher to manage real-time transportation operations for a growing FedEx contractor. This role requires exceptional decision-making skills, strong communication abilities, and the capacity to handle multiple moving priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced logistics environment.



 Key Responsibilities

 - Coordinate daily dispatch operations for 10+ drivers across multiple shifts (3AM-8PM coverage)

 - Monitor and optimize route assignments using Motiv tracking system

 - Handle real-time emergencies including breakdowns, delays, and schedule changes

 - Communicate directly with FedEx terminals regarding route modifications, coverage requests, and service updates

 - Manage driver availability, time-off requests, and schedule coordination

 - Track trailer logistics and coordinate pickup/delivery timing with customer accounts

 - Verify run completion and billing accuracy through MyGroundForce system

 - Respond to urgent coverage needs and coordinate backup driver assignments

 - Monitor driver compliance with safety requirements and training deadlines

 - Coordinate with maintenance vendors for vehicle breakdowns and repairs

 - Maintain organized dispatch logs and communication records

 - Handle customer account changes and service requirement modifications



  Mandatory Requirements:

 - Proven experience in logistics dispatching or transportation coordination

 - Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal) - MUST

 - Strong real-time problem-solving abilities under pressure

 - Experience managing multiple drivers and coordinating complex schedules

 - Comfortable making independent decisions with significant operational impact

 - Tech-savvy with ability to navigate multiple systems simultaneously

 - Available to work US Pacific Time business hours (Monday-Friday)

 - Self-motivated and reliable with strong attention to detail



 Preferred Skills:

 - Experience with fleet management software or tracking systems

 - Background in FedEx Ground operations or similar freight logistics

 - Familiarity with route optimization and load planning

 - Previous experience with vendor coordination

 - Understanding of DOT compliance and safety regulations



  Why Join Us?

  - Work with a growing FedEx contractor in a critical operations role

 - Direct impact on company success and driver satisfaction

 - Stable remote position with consistent schedule

 - Collaborative environment with experienced leadership

 - Opportunity to build and improve operational systems



 If you have the dispatching experience and real-time coordination skills to keep our operations running smoothly, apply now and help us deliver excellence every day.

title: Home Care Sales & Marketing Development Representative
description:
Location: Remote 

Company: CareBridge Virtual 



Job Description 



CareBridge Virtual is seeking a results-driven Home Care Lead Generation, Marketing & Sales Development Representative to support our growing home care operations. This role focuses on generating high-quality leads, building brand awareness, and executing effective marketing and sales development strategies to attract families seeking home care services. 



The ideal candidate is proactive, strategic, and highly organized, with a strong understanding of digital marketing, lead management, and structured communication processes. Your work will directly support client acquisition efforts and drive consistent growth for the organization. 





Key Responsibilities: 



1. Lead Generation & Pipeline Management 

Develop and execute lead generation strategies to attract prospective home care clients. 

Provide full support across the lead pipeline—from initial inquiry to successful close. 

Set and confirm appointments, conduct outreach calls, and perform timely follow-ups. 

Prepare service agreements and manage the transition from inquiry to onboarding. 

Track, analyze, and report on lead performance, conversion rates, and campaign ROI. 



2. Respond to Incoming Leads Immediately 

Monitor multiple lead channels (texts, website, phone,
, referrals). 

Contact new leads within targeted response times. 

Deliver approved outreach messages (SMS,
, phone) in a professional and personable tone. 

Gather initial intake information during first contact. 



3. Execute Structured, Templated Communication 

Use approved messaging templates (scripts, SMS,
). 

Send follow-ups until a clear outcome is reached (booked call / not interested). 

Request guidance for message adjustments when needed. 

Maintain consistency of tone and brand across all communications. 



4. Advance Prospects Toward the Assessment Phase 

Schedule intro calls, assessments, or intake calls. 

Confirm required information before assessments (checklist-driven). 

Keep prospects warm through periodic follow-ups. 

Disqualify leads that do not meet pre-set criteria. 





5. Accurately Document All Leads 

Log every new lead into AxisCare. 

Maintain structured documentation, including: 

- Contact details 

- Type of care needed 

- Urgency 

- Payment details 

- Notes from conversations 

Track lead status, stages, and timestamps. 

Ensure documentation is always audit-ready. 



6. Re-Engage Older Leads 

Review dormant leads on a set schedule. 

Send structured “check-in” messages. 

Re-qualify and reconnect with leads still needing care services. 



7. Success Metrics 

% of new leads contacted within target response time 

% of prospects scheduled for assessments 

CRM accuracy/completeness score 

Number of dormant leads re-engaged weekly 

(KPI targets will be finalized as the role is fully defined.) 



8. Digital Marketing Responsibilities 

Create and manage digital content (social media posts, landing pages,
 campaigns). 

Optimize Google Ads,
 Ads, SEO, and related marketing campaigns to improve lead quality. 

Maintain and enhance online profiles and business listings. 

Support brand-building initiatives through content, storytelling, and community engagement. 



Qualifications: 

Experience : Minimum 1 year in lead generation, digital marketing, sales development, or a related field.  Home care or healthcare experience is an advantage. 



Technical Skills: 

Proficiency with Google Ads,
 Ads Manager, Canva, CRM platforms, SEO/analytics tools. 

Familiarity with AxisCare, spreadsheets, Dialpad, SMS, and
 tools. 



Marketing & Sales Competencies: 

Strong understanding of digital marketing strategies and conversion optimization. 

Excellent verbal and written communication skills. 

Ability to evaluate campaign data and adjust strategies accordingly. 



Work Style & Attributes: 

Process-driven, organized, and detail-oriented. 

Strong follow-through and documentation discipline. 

Professional, calm, and empathetic communication when speaking with families. 

Ability to manage multiple prospects at varying stages of the pipeline. 

Collaborative team player committed to high-quality results. 





Benefits: 

Competitive salary 

HMO coverage 

Opportunities for training and professional development 

Supportive and inclusive work culture 

Remote work flexibility

mber

s

title: Influencer Marketing Specialist
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Influencer Marketing Coordinator to join our dynamic team. This role focuses on managing influencer relationships, coordinating campaigns, and maintaining detailed records in Google Sheets. Based in the Philippines, you will play a key role in connecting with creators to drive impactful marketing campaigns.



Key Responsibilities:



- Database Management: Accurately update and maintain Google Sheets with influencer data, including contact details, engagement metrics, and campaign rates.

- Outreach and Communication: Engage with influencers via direct messages (DMs) on platforms like Instagram and TikTok to negotiate rates and discuss collaboration opportunities.

-
 Management: Promptly respond to
s, monitor incoming responses, and maintain professional communication with creators and stakeholders.

- Lead Evaluation: Assess and qualify influencer leads based on client requirements, ensuring alignment with campaign goals.



Requirements:



- Communication Skills: Exceptional proficiency in English, with strong written and verbal communication skills for professional interactions.

- Influencer Marketing Experience: Proven experience working with creators on campaign deals, including sourcing contact information and negotiating terms.

- Organizational Skills: Ability to manage and organize large datasets in Google Sheets with attention to detail and accuracy.

Tech-Savvy: Familiarity with social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, etc.) and Google Workspace tools.

- Proactive and Independent: Self-motivated with the ability to work remotely, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines.

Location: Must be based in the Philippines.



Preferred Qualifications:



- Experience with influencer marketing tools or CRM platforms is a plus.

- Knowledge of current social media trends and influencer marketing strategies.



Why Join Us?



- Work remotely with flexible hours, connecting with global creators.

- Be part of a fast-growing team passionate about innovative marketing.

- Opportunity to develop skills in influencer outreach and campaign coordination.



How to Apply:



- Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your experience with influencer marketing. Applications are open to Philippines-based candidates only.
